authors: Vanessa Montoya-Uribe;Pooja Choubey;Chad B. Walton;Natalija Glibetic;Won Seok Yang;Femke J. Aan;Sarah Lindsey;Karolina Peplowska;Brenda Y. Hernandez;Joe W. Ramos;Michelle L. Matter
title: Peptidyl-tRNA hydrolase 2 is a negative regulator of peripartum cardiomyopathy with heart failure in female mice
abstract:
Peripartum cardiomyopathy (PPCM) is a potentially fatal heart condition with poorly understood molecular causes. Here, the authors show that loss of the protein PTRH2 in female mice leads to postpartum heart failure, identifying it as a potential therapeutic target. 
 The peptidyl-tRNA hydrolase 2 (PTRH2, Bit-1, BIT1) gene plays a pro-survival role during development with loss of function gene mutations causing congenital infantile multisystem disease (IMNEPD). In wild-type female mice hearts, Ptrh2 protein levels significantly increase during pregnancy and decrease postpartum, demonstrating a protective role in response to pregnancy-initiated cardiac stresses. Peripartum cardiomyopathy (PPCM) is due to dysregulated protective signaling in the pregnant heart. The genetic and molecular mechanisms underlying PPCM remain poorly defined with no specific therapies. Here, we engineered a cardiac-specific Ptrh2 knockout (Ptrh2-CKO) mouse and show these maternal mice develop left ventricular systolic dysfunction, exhibit high rates of postpartum heart failure, and model key features of human PPCM. Infusion of a caspase 3-specific inhibitor attenuated the PPCM phenotype. Collectively, our findings demonstrate Ptrh2 is a negative regulator of pregnancy-induced cardiac stresses by activating pro-survival signals and blocking apoptotic signals, suggesting Ptrh2 may be a therapeutic target for the treatment of PPCM. Peripartum cardiomyopathy (PPCM) is a potentially fatal heart condition with poorly understood molecular causes. Here, the authors show that loss of the protein PTRH2 in female mice leads to postpartum heart failure, identifying it as a potential therapeutic target.

explanation: 该论文主要研究土壤无脊椎动物食物网中能量等效性、体型与密度关系及能量使用模式，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、空气质量监测、大气成分分析）无直接关联。研究聚焦陆地生态系统内部的能量流动和食物网结构，而非大气环境参数的遥感探测或监测。
topic_words: ['energetic equivalence', 'food web architecture', 'size–density scaling', 'energy fluxes', 'trophic level']
authors: Poppy Joaquina Romera;Benoit Gauzens;Ana Carolina Antunes;Ulrich Brose;Nico Eisenhauer;Olga Ferlian;Myriam R. Hirt;Malte Jochum;Grace Mitchell;David Ott;Anton Potapov;Bibishan Rai;Stefan Scheu;Kiri Joy Wallace;Andrew D. Barnes
title: Detection of energetic equivalence depends on food web architecture and estimators of energy use
abstract:
The universality of the energetic equivalence rule has long been debated. Here, the authors show that across 183 soil invertebrate food webs, size–density and energy use varied with trophic level, energy measure, and food web structure, showing that ecosystem energetics depend on context and trophic complexity. 
 Ecologists have long debated the universality of the energetic equivalence rule, which posits that population energy use should be invariant with average body size due to negative size–density scaling. We explore size–density and size–energy use scaling across 183 geographically–distributed soil invertebrate food webs (comprising 55,054 individual soil invertebrates) to investigate the universality of these fundamental energetic equivalence rule assumptions across trophic levels and varying food web structure. Additionally, we compare two measures of energy use to investigate size–energy use relationships: population metabolism and energy fluxes. We find that size–density scaling does not support energetic equivalence in soil communities. Furthermore, evidence of energetic equivalence is dependent on the estimate of energy use applied, the trophic level of consumers, and food web properties. Our study demonstrates a need to integrate food web energetics and trophic structure to better understand how energetic constraints shape the body size structure of terrestrial ecosystems. The universality of the energetic equivalence rule has long been debated. Here, the authors show that across 183 soil invertebrate food webs, size–density and energy use varied with trophic level, energy measure, and food web structure, showing that ecosystem energetics depend on context and trophic complexity.

explanation: 该论文研究锰工程乳酸杆菌（MnLR）与甘油（Gly）复合制剂在结直肠癌（CRC）预防和治疗中的应用，主要涉及微生物工程、肿瘤靶向代谢、免疫激活（如树突状细胞分化、M1巨噬细胞极化、效应T细胞反应）等生物医学领域。尽管提到锰（manganese）这一元素，但研究重点在于其在益生菌治疗中的生物功能增强作用，而非大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测气溶胶、空气质量监测传感器等）。因此，与大气环境遥感技术无直接关联。
authors: Peng Cao;Qilin Li;Yuyu Li;Honglian Guo;Chunyu Wei;Rengui Xu;Chenke Ouyang;Wei Chen;Lin Wang;Zheng Wang
title: Manganese-engineered Lactobacillus Reuteri with enhanced antitumor and immunomodulatory activities for colorectal cancer prevention and treatment
abstract:
Probiotic therapy for colorectal cancer is limited by the poor tumor targeting and low intratumoral activity. The authors show that manganese-engineered L. reuteri with glycerol (MnLR/Gly) accumulates in colorectal tumors, produces cancer-selective metabolites, activates antitumor immunity, and achieves potent, durable tumor suppression in preclinical models. 
 Probiotic-based biotherapy for colorectal cancer (CRC) faces significant challenges due to poor tumor-targeting and limited bioactivities within the complex tumor microenvironment. This study shows that Lactobacillus reuteri (L. reuteri)’s inherent bioactivities, including proliferation, metabolism, and colorectal colonization, can be enhanced by manganese, prompting the fabrication of a manganese-engineered strain (MnLR). Oral administration of MnLR with its metabolic substrate-glycerol (MnLR/Gly) promotes the enrichment of L. reuteri and its antitumor metabolites within colon tumors. Across multiple preclinical colon tumor models, MnLR/Gly alone achieves a 95.6% inhibition of orthotopic tumor growth, liver metastases reduction by 62.1%, and confers durable protection, with 75% of prophylactically treated mice remaining long-term tumor-free and 62.5% resisting tumor rechallenge. Mechanistically, MnLR/Gly induces both intratumoral and peripheral dendritic cell maturation, M1 macrophage polarization, and effector T-cell responses. In orthotopic CRC rabbit models, GlyMnLR enteric capsules demonstrate significant antitumor efficacy comparable to standard chemotherapy while exhibiting favorable safety. These findings highlight MnLR as an effective standalone probiotic therapy for CRC prevention and treatment. Probiotic therapy for colorectal cancer is limited by the poor tumor targeting and low intratumoral activity. The authors show that manganese-engineered L. reuteri with glycerol (MnLR/Gly) accumulates in colorectal tumors, produces cancer-selective metabolites, activates antitumor immunity, and achieves potent, durable tumor suppression in preclinical models.

authors: Xiaoxu Li;Alessia Perino;Jonathan Sulc;Antoine Jalil;Giacomo V. G. von Alvensleben;Jean-David Morel;Qi Wang;Alexis Rapin;Hao Li;Kristina Schoonjans;Johan Auwerx
title: Genetic and dietary determinants of gut microbiome-bile acid interactions in the BXD genetic reference population
abstract:
The authors show that genetic and dietary factors reshape the microbiome and influence gut microbiome–bile acid crosstalk. They also identify potential modulators and offer insights into microbiome–host communication. 
 The gut microbiome is crucial in regulating overall physiology and communicates with the host through various microbial-derived metabolites, including secondary bile acids (BAs). However, mechanisms underlying the gut microbiome-BA crosstalk (gMxB) are still poorly understood. Here, we assess the postprandial cecal microbiome, BA levels, and colon transcriptome of male BXD mice fed with a chow or high-fat diet, and find that genetic and dietary factors shift microbiome composition and affect gMxB. Four diet-dependent co-mapping genetic loci associated with gMxB, including the interaction between Turicibacter sanguinis - plasma cholic acid, are identified using systems genetics approaches. By integrating human MiBioGen database, we prioritize PTGR1 and PTPRD as candidate genes potentially regulating identified gMxB. The human relevance of these candidates on metabolic health is investigated using data from the UK biobank, FinnGen, and million veteran program databases. Overall, this study illustrates potential modulators regulating gMxB and provides insights into gut microbiome-host communication. The authors show that genetic and dietary factors reshape the microbiome and influence gut microbiome–bile acid crosstalk. They also identify potential modulators and offer insights into microbiome–host communication.

explanation: 该研究聚焦于柯萨奇病毒A6的分子进入机制和中和抗体开发，主要涉及病毒受体（KRM1）、硫酸肝素（HSPG）及抗体中和作用。其内容与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、气溶胶反演、空气质量监测等）无直接关联，属于分子病毒学和免疫学范畴。
authors: Xianliang Ke;Xue Li;Zeyu Liu;Kexin Liu;Weichi Liu;Xingyu Yan;Bo Shu;Chao Zhang
title: Molecular mechanisms of receptor recognition and antibody neutralization of coxsackievirus A6
abstract:
This study defines a two-receptor entry mechanism for coxsackievirus A6: heparan sulfate for initial attachment and KRM1 for uncoating. Protective antibodies that block KRM1 binding were identified, offering a path for therapeutic development. 
 Coxsackievirus A6 (CVA6), a major cause of hand, foot, and mouth disease, lacks approved vaccines or drugs. KRM1 is its only known receptor, but its precise role remains unclear. This study investigates CVA6’s entry mechanism and antibody neutralization. Cryo-EM shows CVA6 clinical strain HeB primarily exists as mature virions. KRM1 binding within the canyon triggers conversion to uncoating intermediate, defining KRM1 as an uncoating receptor for CVA6. However, KRM1 knockout reduces CVA6 infectivity without affecting attachment. Conversely, disrupting heparan sulfate proteoglycan (HSPG) impairs both viral attachment and infectivity, and CVA6 virions bind heparin directly. These results support a two-receptor entry model for CVA6: HSPG mediates viral attachment, while KRM1 induces uncoating. Additionally, we develop two CVA6-specific protective antibodies (1F4 and 3H7), targeting a new antigenic site near the three-fold axis of the viral capsid. These antibodies sterically block KRM1 binding and function post-attachment, consistent with KRM1’s role. The findings elucidate CVA6 entry and offer a basis for antibody interventions. This study defines a two-receptor entry mechanism for coxsackievirus A6: heparan sulfate for initial attachment and KRM1 for uncoating. Protective antibodies that block KRM1 binding were identified, offering a path for therapeutic development.

explanation: 该论文研究乳腺癌转移细胞中乳酸代谢通过CD147/MCT1/LDHB复合体维持干细胞潜力的机制，属于肿瘤生物学领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、气溶胶反演、空气质量监测等）无直接关联。研究内容聚焦细胞分子机制和临床治疗方案，未涉及大气参数监测、遥感传感器或环境数据分析技术。
authors: Jia-Jia Zhang;Ruo-Fei Tian;Chang-Geng Song;Rui Liu;Duo He;Gai-Qin Zhang;Xin-Yu Fan;Zi-Chuan Duan;Kun Zhang;Tian-Jiao Zhang;Ya-Tong Chen;Jian Zhang;Ke Wang;Ju-Mei Zhao;Xiang-Min Yang;Zhi-Nan Chen;Ling Li
title: Lactate mitochondrial oxidation drives stemness potential in metastatic breast cancer
abstract:
Metastatic cancer cells rely on metabolic flexibility to survive. Here, the authors show that metastatic breast cancer cells use lactate for mitochondrial oxidation via the CD147/MCT1/LDHB complex to sustain stemness and promote metastasis. 
 Metastatic cancer cells, originating from cancer stem cells with metastatic capacity, utilize nutrient flexibility to navigate the challenges of the metastatic cascade. However, the nutrient required to maintain the stemness potentials of metastatic cancer cells remains unclear. Here, we reveal that metastatic breast cancer cells sustain stemness and initiate metastasis upon detachment by taking up and oxidizing lactate. In detached metastasizing breast cancer cells, lactate is incorporated into the tricarboxylic acid cycle, boosting oxidative phosphorylation, and promoting the stemness potentials via α-KG-DNMT3B-mediated SOX2 hypomethylation. Moreover, lactate is taken up and oxidized in mitochondria by the CD147/MCT1/LDHB complex, which correlates with stemness potentials and tumor metastasis in patients with breast cancer. An intracellularly expressed single-chain variable fragment targeting mitochondrial CD147 (mito-CD147 scFv) effectively disrupts the mitochondrial CD147/MCT1/LDHB complex, inhibits lactate-induced stemness potential, depletes circulating breast cancer cells, and reduces metastatic burden, suggesting promising clinical applications in reducing lactate-fueled metastasis. Metastatic cancer cells rely on metabolic flexibility to survive. Here, the authors show that metastatic breast cancer cells use lactate for mitochondrial oxidation via the CD147/MCT1/LDHB complex to sustain stemness and promote metastasis.

explanation: 该论文研究亚洲灰尘的光学特性，特别是通过观测约束的模拟修正复折射指数虚部（k值），直接影响卫星遥感中气溶胶反演和吸光参数的准确性。其成果应用于气候模型（CAS-ESM2），修正了气溶胶光学深度（AAOD）和单次散射反照率（SSA）的误差，为大气遥感技术中的气溶胶监测和辐射效应评估提供了关键参数支持。
topic_words: ['Asian dust', 'complex refractive index', 'single scattering albedo (SSA)', 'aerosol optical depth (AOD)']
authors: Youjia Yuan;Hao Wang;Chenglai Wu;Tafeng Hu;Feng Wu;Daizhou Zhang;Junji Cao
title: Weaker absorption of Asian dust than previously estimated based on observation-constrained simulation
abstract:
Weaker absorption of Asian dust than previously estimated based on observation-constrained simulation 
 Dust aerosols constitute a major component of shortwave-absorbing aerosols, with absorption uncertainties predominantly associated with mineral composition variations. To address this, we analyzed 22 East Asian dust (EAD) samples and derived a revised imaginary part of the complex refractive index ($$k$$), with a range spanning from $$2.26\times {10}^{-4}$$–$$8.37\times {10}^{-4}$$ in 0.3–1 μm, which is significantly lower than the Optical Properties of Aerosols and Clouds (OPAC) and the values commonly used in research on East Asian. The improved optical parameters applied to CAS-ESM2 for spring dust simulations have been shown to reduce single scattering albedo (SSA) bias from 15% to 2% and absorption aerosol optical depth (AAOD) overestimation from +5.2% to −1.7%. The modified scheme reduces atmospheric absorption by 79.5% (−7.61 W/m2) and reverses the top of atmospheric shortwave radiation effect to −3.80 W/m2. This outcome revealed that dust absorption in East Asia is weak and the climate impact is significantly different from previous assessments.

explanation: 该论文研究新烟碱类农药（如尼诺普拉姆）在水相中的光化学反应及其生成的气态活性氮（如HONO、NOx），虽然涉及大气化学和全球气候模型，但未提及遥感技术、卫星观测或气溶胶/空气质量数据反演方法。其研究重点为实验室和理论模拟，而非大气环境监测技术本身。
authors: Jiangping Liu;Zhu Ran;Yanan Hu;Dedong He;Can Ye;Keding Lu;Haichao Wang;Shuai Li;Xiao Lu;Jingwei Zhang;Zhijiong Huang;Junyu Zheng;Xinming Wang;Yongming Luo;Sasho Gligorovski
title: Aqueous photochemistry of neonicotinoids unveils a major source of atmospheric reactive nitrogen impacting global climate
abstract:
Aqueous photochemistry of neonicotinoids unveils a major source of atmospheric reactive nitrogen impacting global climate 
 Neonicotinoid insecticides (NNs), widely deployed in agriculture, are now recognized as pervasive environmental contaminants. This study reveals that the photochemical degradation of nitenpyram (NPM), a prominent NN, in the aqueous phase generates substantial fluxes of gaseous reactive nitrogen species, including nitrous acid (HONO) and nitrogen oxides (NOx = NO + NO2). Reaction pathways, elucidated through aqueous and gas-phase product analysis and density functional theory (DFT) calculations, demonstrate that HONO, NO2, and NO arise directly from the excited triplet state of NPM. Global modeling, parameterized by laboratory-derived kinetics, estimates annual emissions of 71.2 Gg N yr−1 (NOx) and 40.7 Gg N yr−1 (HONO) from NPM photodegradation. These emissions elevate boundary-layer concentrations of HONO, ozone (O3), and OH by 0.54%, 0.11%, and 0.20%, respectively, globally. Our findings uncover a significant, yet overlooked, source of reactive nitrogen that perturbs global nitrogen cycling, amplifies atmospheric oxidative capacity, and influences climate dynamics.

explanation: 该论文主要研究青藏高原夏季极端降水的气候机制，涉及大气波 trains 和北极海冰融化等自然现象，但未明确提及遥感技术（如卫星观测、气溶胶反演等）的应用或数据源，因此与大气环境遥感技术直接关联较弱。
topic_words: ['Tibetan Plateau', 'summer extreme precipitation', 'atmospheric wave train', 'Arctic sea ice loss']
authors: XiaoJing Jia;Fangchi Liu;Wei Dong;Xinhai Chen;Qifeng Qian
title: Amplified summer extreme precipitation over the Tibetan Plateau in the early 21st century
abstract:
Amplified summer extreme precipitation over the Tibetan Plateau in the early 21st century 
 The Tibetan Plateau (TP) has experienced significant intensification of extreme precipitation events in recent decades, with cascading risks to water security and fragile ecosystems. This study reveals a distinct post-2000 surge in summer extreme precipitation over the TP, characterized primarily by a sharp increase in event frequency, with the northwestern TP emerging as the predominant hotspot. We attribute this amplification to enhanced moisture convergence, dynamically modulated by an anomalous anticyclone to the east of the northwestern TP. Mechanistically, this key anticyclonic anomaly constitutes a pivotal node in an atmospheric wave train anchored by concurrent North Atlantic sea surface warming and Arctic sea ice loss. Our findings underscore a post-2000 increased Arctic control over Third Pole hydroclimate variability, providing new insights into how Arctic climate impacts vulnerable mountain systems.

explanation: 该论文主要研究美国玉米带地区玉米残茬碳输入量的变化及其经济价值，以及由此对保护性农业实践（如少耕和覆盖作物）的影响。研究方法包括实地试验和公众问卷调查，未涉及卫星遥感、大气成分分析或空气污染监测等技术或数据来源。因此，其核心关注农业管理和碳循环，与大气环境遥感技术无直接关联。
topic_words: ['maize residue carbon inputs', 'US Corn Belt', 'conservation practices']
authors: Alejo Ruiz;Michael J. Castellano;Antonella Ferela;Slobodan Trifunovic;Douglas M. Eudy;Brenda L. Gambin;Gerasimos J. N. Danalatos;Tomas Della Chiesa;Daniel Northrup;Sotirios V. Archontoulis
title: Large increases in maize residue carbon inputs in the US Corn Belt from 1980 to 2020
abstract:
Maize residue carbon inputs in the US Corn Belt increased by 46% from 1980 to 2020, worth $14.7 billion in today’s carbon markets, but challenging the progress of conservation practices, based on field experiments combined with public surveys. 
 Maize residue, the remaining biomass after crop harvest, represents the largest soil carbon input in agricultural lands. Residue affects crop yields and sustainability through its impact on soil carbon-nutrient-water processes. Here, we address the lack of spatial and temporal knowledge by synthesizing field experiments with public surveys to estimate maize residue quantity and quality at the county level in the US Corn Belt. We found that maize residue carbon input has increased by 46% from 1980 to 2020, with today’s gross production worth $14.3 billion in carbon markets. The increase was caused by increased maize productivity (77%) and area expansion (23%). While more residue production is desirable for soil carbon sequestration, large residue amounts challenge the implementation of conservation practices such as low-intensity tillage and cover crops. The historical increase in maize residue amount is large and variable across the landscape. Our study provides actionable data for re-assessing residue management practices to optimize productivity and sustainability, especially in high-yielding areas. Maize residue carbon inputs in the US Corn Belt increased by 46% from 1980 to 2020, worth $14.7 billion in today’s carbon markets, but challenging the progress of conservation practices, based on field experiments combined with public surveys.

explanation: 该论文主要探讨将原住民的文化和生态价值纳入自然资本核算体系，通过澳大利亚三个案例研究说明协作、数据主权和原住民声音的重要性。虽然涉及环境保护决策，但未提及卫星观测、大气成分分析、污染物监测或具体遥感技术，与大气环境遥感技术领域无直接关联。
authors: Anna Normyle;Diane Jarvis;Emma Woodward;Daniel Grainger;Dean Mathews;Julie Melbourne;Bruce Doran;Michael Vardon
title: Recognizing First Nations' values in natural capital accounting benefits all
abstract:
Including First Nations’ cultural and ecological values in natural capital accounting by engaging with land and sea managers helps bridge the gap between Indigenous and Western knowledge and enables inclusive decision making, as discussed through three Australian case studies in this Perspective. 
 First Nations’ values are frequently overlooked in public and private sector decision-making. Natural Capital Accounting is increasingly promoted for decision-making but overlooks First Nations’ values, limiting its potential. Here, we present three Australian case studies highlighting the approaches, challenges, and progress made towards integrating First Nations’ values into accounting, aiming to distil lessons and help realize accounting’s potential to achieve transformative change in how decisions affecting First Nations people are made globally. We conclude that collaboration, respecting data sovereignty, and prioritizing First Nations’ voices are needed for comprehensive accounting. We recommend establishing an international working group under the auspices of the United Nations to include recognition of these values in accounting and how this recognition can inform decision-making. Recognizing First Nations’ values in Natural Capital Accounting benefits all by making these values visible and providing First Nations people, literally and figuratively, a “seat at the table” in the decisions affecting them. Including First Nations’ cultural and ecological values in natural capital accounting by engaging with land and sea managers helps bridge the gap between Indigenous and Western knowledge and enables inclusive decision making, as discussed through three Australian case studies in this Perspective.

explanation: 该论文主要研究气候变化对文化遗产石质表面微生物群落功能基因的影响，涉及微生物降解与保护机制，基因如napAB、narGHI等。尽管提到了气候驱动因素，但研究内容集中在微生物生态与文化遗产保护，未涉及大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、污染物监测或遥感算法），因此相关性较低。
topic_words: ['dissimilatory nitrate reduction', 'assimilatory sulfate reduction', 'biofilm', 'cultural heritage', 'genomic data']
authors: Haiqing Yang;Xingyue Li;Liyuan Chai;Le Wang;Chongchong Qi
title: Climate-driven transition in microbial deterioration and protection of stone surfaces at cultural heritage sites
abstract:
Microbial biofilm effects in cultural heritage sites shift from deterioration to protection regulated by climate-driven variations in functional genes, according to the temperate-to-tropical climate transition, according to genomic data from 10 stone cultural heritage sites in East and South Asia. 
 Understanding the response of biofilms to climatic conditions and their effects on cultural heritage sites is crucial for developing effective conservation strategies. Previous studies have primarily focused on microbial community responses to environmental factors, and little is known about how climatic conditions influence biofilm-induced deterioration and protection. Here we analyzed genomic data from stone heritage sites in East and South Asia and found that biofilm roles shifted from causing deterioration to offering protection along the transition from temperate to tropical climates. This shift was likely regulated by climate-driven variations in functional genes associated with dissimilatory nitrate reduction (napAB, narGHI, nrfAH, and nirBD) and assimilatory sulfate reduction (cysJI and sir). The expression of genes related to these pathways inhibits the accumulation of soluble salts and biogenic acids, leading to protective effects. This study elucidates the dynamic role of microbes in cultural heritage conservation and lays the foundation for sustainable preservation strategies. Microbial biofilm effects in cultural heritage sites shift from deterioration to protection regulated by climate-driven variations in functional genes, according to the temperate-to-tropical climate transition, according to genomic data from 10 stone cultural heritage sites in East and South Asia.

explanation: 该论文主要研究弧状岩浆的初始亲硫元素丰度受源过程影响，涉及地球化学分析、岩相学证据及模型模拟，内容聚焦地质学中的火成岩演化与矿物元素分布，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测、大气成分分析等）无直接关联。
authors: Yanjun Wang;Xilian Chen;Shaohao Zou;Kaixuan Li;Bingjin Yu;Xingchun Zhang;Wei Zhang;Liang Qi;Chengbiao Leng
title: The source processes affect the initial chalcophile element fertility of arc magmas
abstract:
In West Junggar, China, the unique genesis of oceanic slab-derived adakites explains their distinct platinum-group element and copper patterns relative to typical arc magmas, according to isotopic and trace elemental analyses. 
 The chalcophile element fertility of arc magmas that modulates the enrichment of gold in porphyry copper deposits is negatively correlated with magma differentiation depth, which was attributed to sulfide saturation during magmatic evolution. However, the role of magma source processes remains to be evaluated. Here, we investigate the platinum-group element and copper systematics of a suite of oceanic slab-derived adakitic dikes from West Junggar, NW China. Geochemical and petrographic evidence suggests the adakitic magmas underwent sulfide segregation, but invokes a source control on the chalcophile element variations. Modeling indicates that adakitic melts were initially depleted in copper and palladium, and have gained palladium via interaction with peridotite. Our results demonstrate that source processes can greatly affect the initial chalcophile element fertility of arc magmas. High-degree mantle melting, combined with late sulfide saturation, produces ore-forming magmas with high chalcophile element fertility, favoring the gold-rich porphyry copper mineralization under thin arcs. In West Junggar, China, the unique genesis of oceanic slab-derived adakites explains their distinct platinum-group element and copper patterns relative to typical arc magmas, according to isotopic and trace elemental analyses.

explanation: 该论文主要研究土壤pH值通过增强硝化作用来减少氨挥发的过程，其核心是农业环境中的生物化学机制，并未涉及卫星观测、遥感传感器、大气成分遥感反演等大气环境遥感技术相关的研究内容或方法。
authors: Xiaodong Ge;Danni Xie;Jan Mulder;Lei Duan
title: Enhanced nitrification in higher pH soils moderates ammonia emissions in global croplands
abstract:
Higher soil pH promotes rapid ammonia oxidation through enhanced nitrification, thereby reducing substrate availability for ammonia volatilization that finally leads to reduced ammonia emission, according to an analysis of 1792 field measurements across global croplands. 
 Ammonia (NH3) emissions from agricultural lands represent a major environmental concern, with current emission models heavily relying on inherent soil pH as a key determinant based on chemical equilibrium principles. Here, analyzing 1792 field measurements across global croplands, we demonstrate that soils with inherently higher pH generally have lower NH3 emissions. We identify enhanced nitrification as the key mechanism, where higher pH promotes rapid NH3 oxidation, thereby reducing substrate availability for NH3 volatilization. This biological process can reduce NH3 emissions by 11% per unit increase in inherent soil pH. In paddy rice, nitrification is inhibited due to the flooded environment, leading to higher emission factors (EF) than upland crops, with EF positively correlating with pH above approximately 7.5. Our findings highlight that current emission inventories may substantially misestimate NH3 emissions by oversimplifying pH effects and overlooking biological processes. Higher soil pH promotes rapid ammonia oxidation through enhanced nitrification, thereby reducing substrate availability for ammonia volatilization that finally leads to reduced ammonia emission, according to an analysis of 1792 field measurements across global croplands.

explanation: 该论文主要关注土地覆盖制图过程中的二氧化碳排放及其减少策略，虽涉及环境监测领域，但未明确使用卫星观测、大气成分分析或气溶胶反演等技术手段。研究核心是碳排放建模与减排策略，而非大气环境遥感的具体技术应用。
topic_words: ['global land cover mapping', 'carbon dioxide emissions', 'process-based estimation model']
authors: Hengbin Wang;Yu Yao;Yuanyuan Zhao;Shaoming Li;Zhe Liu;Xiaodong Zhang
title: Carbon dioxide emissions from global land cover mapping are projected to increase by 2050
abstract:
The global land cover mapping contributes to carbon dioxide emissions projected to increase by 2050, and strategies exist to reduce emissions by 35 percent, according to an analysis that uses a process-based estimation model integrated with large-scale literature and mapping data. 
 Global land cover mapping is essential for environmental monitoring and earth system modeling, but the high production costs lead to considerable carbon dioxide emissions that are rarely considered. We develop a carbon dioxide emission method for land cover mapping, which takes into account both direct and indirect carbon dioxide emissions associated with the mapping process. The results show that completing annual global land cover mapping at a 30 m resolution generate an estimated 6,880.7 to 10,126.6 tonnes of carbon dioxide emissions. Based on mapping information extracted from publications published between 2014 and 2024, the cumulative emissions from land cover mapping during this period were approximately 3.89 million tonnes. Projections indicate that by 2050, annual emissions could exceed 184.09 million tonnes. To address the carbon effect, we propose three emission reduction strategies: artificial intelligence-assisted collaborative sample labeling, pre-training models with unlabeled data, and model compression techniques, achieving up to a 35% reduction in carbon dioxide emissions. Our results reveal the potential for carbon dioxide emission reduction in land cover mapping, providing a pathway toward sustainable, low-carbon mapping frameworks. The global land cover mapping contributes to carbon dioxide emissions projected to increase by 2050, and strategies exist to reduce emissions by 35 percent, according to an analysis that uses a process-based estimation model integrated with large-scale literature and mapping data.

explanation: 该论文主要研究中亚地区地壳抬升的驱动机制，涉及岩石年代学（如裂变径迹和U-Th/He数据）、板块构造模型和古气候重建。虽然提到了古气候（paleoclimate），但并未涉及大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、污染物监测、大气成分分析等具体技术手段或设备）。其研究重点为地质动力学过程，而非通过遥感技术获取大气环境数据或进行分析，因此相关性较低。
authors: Samuel C. Boone;Stijn Glorie;Sabin Zahirovic;Angus Nixon;Fun Meeuws;Fabian Kohlmann
title: Deciphering mantle, tectonic and climatic drivers of exhumation
abstract:
The unroofing of Central Asia over the last 230 Myr was driven by subduction dynamics along the Tethyan margin, according to a workflow for deciphering mantle, tectonic and climatic drivers of exhumation. 
 Regional thermochronology provides an important record of crustal exhumation through deep time. However, untangling the myriad of geodynamic, tectonic, climatic and surface processes responsible for long-term upper crustal cooling is often hindered by thermochronology data being conventionally interpreted in a static geographic framework. Here, we present a workflow for interpreting thermochronology data and thermal history models via integration with numerical plate tectonic, mantle convection, and paleoclimate reconstructions. Using a compilation of inverse thermal history models from Central Asia, based on fission-track and (U-Th)/He data, we demonstrate the power of placing thermochronology data in their paleogeographic context to untangle the geodynamic, tectonic and climate drivers of exhumation. This shows that the diachronous Mesozoic-to-recent (230-0 Ma) exhumation history of Central Asia was primarily controlled by reactivation of pre-Mesozoic crustal-scale shear zones in response to plate kinematics and Tethyan subduction dynamics, while dynamic topography and changes in paleoprecipitation played relatively insignificant roles. The unroofing of Central Asia over the last 230 Myr was driven by subduction dynamics along the Tethyan margin, according to a workflow for deciphering mantle, tectonic and climatic drivers of exhumation.

explanation: 该论文主要研究通过δ¹³C同位素分析，从考古碳化谷物中检测欧洲地区C₄植物消费量。虽然涉及环境因素（如不同生态区的δ¹³C基线调整），但其核心方法是地质考古学中的同位素分析技术，未涉及大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、气溶胶反演等）。研究重点在于饮食结构与农业历史的考古重建，而非大气环境监测或遥感的物理技术手段。
topic_words: ['δ¹³C analysis', 'C₄ plant consumption', 'archaeological charred grains', 'multicomponent environmental models', 'ecozone cluster analysis']
authors: Margaux L. C. Depaermentier;Michael Kempf;Giedrė Motuzaitė Matuzevičiūtė
title: Environmentally adjusted δ13C thresholds for accurate detection of C4 plant consumption in Europe
abstract:
European-wide C₃ grain δ¹³C baseline enables adjusted δ¹³C thresholds for C₄ consumption at site and ecozone scales, to account for ecological variations of human and animal diet, according to analysis of 4,000 δ¹³C values from archaeological charred C₃ and C₄ grains. 
 Detecting C4 plants consumption is central to investigating animal ecology, agriculture, dietary transitions, and socio-environmental adaptations, and can be done using carbon isotope analysis. The conventional δ¹³C threshold used to identify C4 plant intake does not consider substantial ecological variability across Europe. By analyzing over 4,000 δ13C values from archaeological C3 and C4 grains, we present a European-wide C3 grain δ13C baseline and establish adjusted δ13C threshold estimations for C4 consumption from the site to the ecozone scale using multicomponent environmental models and ecozone cluster analysis. We show that a fixed threshold lead to under- or overestimation of C4 plant consumption, particularly in northern/humid and southern/arid regions, where the threshold needs to be revised downwards or upwards by up to 2‰. This refined framework offers a more accurate baseline for interpreting human and animal diet and enhances our understanding of the spread, adoption and consumption of C4 crops across Europe. 
                
                  
                
               European-wide C₃ grain δ¹³C baseline enables adjusted δ¹³C thresholds for C₄ consumption at site and ecozone scales, to account for ecological variations of human and animal diet, according to analysis of 4,000 δ¹³C values from archaeological charred C₃ and C₄ grains.

explanation: 该论文主要研究基于地面激光扫描的树木体积重建方法，属于林业遥感和3D建模领域。其技术核心聚焦于植被结构与激光点云数据的关联分析，未涉及大气成分、气溶胶反演、卫星观测或空气质量监测等直接相关的大气环境遥感技术关键词或应用场景。
authors: Timothy Devereux;Thomas Lowe;Joshua Rivory;Rafael Bohn Reckziegel;Kim Calders;Raja Ram Aryal;Glen Eaton;Zane Cooper;Shaun Levick;Stuart Phinn;William Woodgate
title: RayExtract: A fast, scalable method for tree volume reconstruction from terrestrial laser scanning

explanation: 该论文基于SDGSAT-1卫星数据，提出了一种利用波段相关性的新型地表温度反演方法，并用于大气参数建模。研究涉及卫星观测数据（属于遥感技术）、地表温度反演（大气环境监测的关键指标之一）、波段相关性算法（遥感解译技术）以及大气参数建模（直接关联大气环境分析），因此与大气环境遥感技术高度相关。
topic_words: ['SDGSAT-1 data', 'channel correlation', 'land surface temperature retrieval', 'atmospheric parameter modeling']
authors: Li-Qin Cao;Hang Zhao;Du Wang;Yan-Fei Zhong;Fa-Wang Ye
title: A novel land surface temperature retrieval method using channel correlation for atmospheric parameter modeling from SDGSAT-1 data

explanation: 该论文主要关注森林土壤湿度和植被光学深度的L波段辐射度建模与反演技术，属于地表遥感和植被参数反演领域，并未涉及大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分分析）、卫星观测（如气象卫星数据应用）或气溶胶反演等直接相关的大气环境遥感技术。
authors: Andreas Colliander;Mike Schwank;Yiwen Zhou;Mehmet Kurum;Cristina Vittucci;Leung Tsang;Alex Roy;Aaron Berg
title: A review of forward modelling and retrieval approaches for forest soil moisture and vegetation optical depth using L-band radiometry

explanation: 该研究主要聚焦于通过LiDAR生成的3D查找表从Landsat卫星数据中提取森林叶面积指数（LAI），属于地表植被参数反演领域。虽然涉及遥感技术（Landsat、LiDAR），但核心目标是森林结构参数的定量获取，而非大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分分析、气溶胶反演等）。
authors: Jianbo Qi;Siying He;Xun Zhao;Su Ye;Tianjia Chu;Zhexiu Yu;Simei Lin;Huaguo Huang
title: Retrieving forest LAI from Landsat via 3D look-up table generated by realistic LiDAR scenes

explanation: 该研究通过开发一种抑制干扰的叶绿素指数，旨在减少土壤和植被冠层对植被叶绿素监测的影响，属于植被遥感技术改进的范畴。叶绿素监测常与大气环境遥感相关联，例如在卫星观测中校正大气干扰以提升植被参数反演精度。尽管标题未直接提及大气污染物或气体成分分析，但其方法可能间接服务于大气环境监测中的植被健康评估，因此判定为相关。
authors: Tao Sun;Zijun Tang;Youzhen Xiang;Junsheng Lu;Yaohui Cai;Wangyang Li;Ruiqi Du;Xianghui Lu;Shouyang Liu;Tianjie Zhao;Zhijun Li;Fucang Zhang
title: Development of an interference mitigation chlorophyll index for mitigating soil and canopy dependence to improve vegetation chlorophyll content monitoring

explanation: 该论文聚焦于利用DSCOVR/EPIC卫星数据结合深度学习与物理算法估算地表太阳辐射，虽然使用了遥感技术（DSCOVR/EPIC），但其核心目标是太阳能辐射的映射与建模，而非直接涉及大气环境监测（如空气质量、气溶胶反演、大气成分分析等）。研究主题更偏向能源气象学与遥感数据应用，与大气环境遥感技术的核心需求（如污染物追踪、大气参数反演）关联较弱。
authors: Wenjun Tang;Jinwen Qi;Junmei He;Fuxin Zhu;Chuanming Yuan;Jinyan Yang;Bing Hu
title: A novel hybrid approach for mapping global surface solar radiation with DSCOVR/EPIC: Combining deep learning with physical algorithm

explanation: 该论文通过Sentinel-2卫星的表面反射率和光合有效辐射数据，构建了估算GPP（总初级生产量）的神经网络模型。GPP是植被生产力的核心指标，其估算依赖于卫星遥感数据（如Sentinel-2），而该数据直接用于大气环境监测中的植被动态分析和碳循环研究，符合大气环境遥感技术的范畴。
authors: Shaoyu Wang;Youngryel Ryu;Benjamin Dechant;Helin Zhang;Huaize Feng;Jeongho Lee;Changhyun Choi
title: GPP-net: a robust high-resolution GPP estimation network for Sentinel-2 using only surface reflectance and photosynthetically active radiation

explanation: 该论文基于卫星偏振观测，研究粒子形状与冰云光学厚度反演方法。这些参数属于大气成分与环境监测的关键指标，与卫星遥感技术直接相关。通过偏振数据反演大气参数，属于大气环境遥感技术的应用范畴。
topic_words: ['satellite polarimetric observations', 'particle shape retrieval', 'ice cloud optical thickness']
authors: Yizhen Meng;Lei Bi;Wei Han
title: A synergistic super-ellipsoidal particle shape and ice cloud optical thickness retrieval method based on satellite polarimetric observations

explanation: 该论文使用高光谱遥感技术（Hyperspectral）结合海洋颜色指数（OCI）和平流层气溶胶气候实验（PACE），研究大西洋马尾藻（Sargassum）的分布与动态变化。OCI属于海洋环境遥感技术，用于监测叶绿素和生物生产力；PACE涉及平流层气溶胶的遥感观测，两者均与大气环境监测技术相关。论文通过遥感数据解析海洋浮游植物（如马尾藻）的生态特征，间接涉及大气-海洋相互作用中的物质传输和环境影响，符合大气环境遥感技术的范畴。
authors: Lin Qi;Menghua Wang;Chuanmin Hu;Yuyuan Xie;Brian B. Barnes
title: Hyperspectral OCI/PACE observations of the Atlantic Sargassum

explanation: 该论文主要研究西班牙半岛森林结构的变化趋势，结合激光雷达和光学传感器的协同使用。虽然激光雷达属于遥感技术，但研究重点在森林结构分析，未明确涉及大气环境参数（如气溶胶、温室气体、空气质量监测）。因此与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: M. Tanase;J.P. Martini;P. Miranda;D. Garcia;V. Wilke;S. Miguel;C. Mihai;J. Diez;S. Natal;D. San Martin;P. Ruiz-Benito
title: Long-term forest structure trends in the peninsular Spain from lidar-optical sensors synergies

explanation: 该研究聚焦于海洋浮游植物群落的反演，尽管使用了遥感技术（如卫星影像），但其核心对象为海洋生物地球化学参数，而非大气环境要素（如污染物、温室气体、大气成分等）。大气环境遥感技术通常指直接监测大气层内成分或污染物的传感器（如气溶胶廓析仪、臭氧监测卫星），与海洋遥感应用领域存在区分。
authors: Xueyin Li;Shuguo Chen;Junwei Wang;Qing Zhu
title: Retrieval of global surface phytoplankton community structure using a minimal set of predictors

explanation: 该论文标题明确提及MODIS-Aqua卫星数据，该卫星是用于大气环境监测的重要遥感平台。'remote sensing reflectance'（遥感反射率）数据库直接关联到大气遥感技术，例如气溶胶反演、大气成分分析等应用场景。此外，20余年的长期数据积累对支持大气环境长期监测研究（如空气质量变化、云气溶胶相互作用等）至关重要。
authors: Longteng Zhao;Zhongping Lee;Xiaolong Yu;Tianhao Wang;Daosheng Wang;Shaoling Shang
title: Highest quality remote sensing reflectance database compiled from 20+ years of MODIS-aqua measurements

explanation: 该论文通过SAR（合成孔径雷达）与光学遥感数据的双时相融合，解决大云量覆盖下卫星影像清晰度问题，直接服务于大气环境监测中卫星数据解云和地表信息提取的技术需求，与空气质量监测、卫星观测等密切相关。
authors: Yu Xia;Wei He;Liangpei Zhang;Hongyan Zhang
title: Began+: Leveraging bi-temporal SAR-optical data fusion to reconstruct clear-sky satellite imagery under large cloud cover

explanation: 该论文专注于利用Landsat-8/9和Sentinel-2卫星的时序影像数据，通过时空注意力机制实现多分辨率融合，这一技术对大气环境监测（如空气质量、植被覆盖分析）中卫星数据的优化处理有直接应用价值。
authors: Julien Michel;Jordi Inglada
title: Temporal attention multi-resolution fusion of satellite image time-series, applied to Landsat-8/9 and Sentinel-2: all bands, any time, at best spatial resolution

explanation: 该论文研究的是通过卫星微波测量估算海面泡沫覆盖范围和有效泡沫层厚度，虽然涉及卫星遥感技术，但其核心关注海洋表面泡沫而非大气环境参数（如空气质量、大气成分、气溶胶反演等）。海面泡沫属于海洋物理过程，与大气环境远程传感技术无直接关联。
topic_words: ['sea surface foam', 'satellite microwave', ' foam layer thickness', 'oceanographic remote sensing']
authors: Xuchen Jin;Xianqiang He;Palanisamy Shanmugam;Yan Bai;Jianyun Ying;Qiankun Zhu;Yaqi Zhao;Delu Pan
title: Estimation of sea surface foam coverage and effective foam layer thickness from satellite microwave measurements

explanation: 该论文主要研究无人机激光雷达（UAV lidar）衍生的灌木结构指数，用于估算地上生物量，属于植被遥感或生态监测领域。虽然无人机和激光雷达是遥感技术，但核心应用是地表植被结构和生物量反演，而非大气环境参数（如空气污染、气溶胶、温室气体等）的监测或分析，因此与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: Jiamin Wu;Yaxin Wang;Liang Hong;Bin Sun;Zhenping He;Zejiang Li;Zhijie Ma
title: A novel UAV lidar-derived shrub structural index for estimating above-ground biomass

explanation: 该论文主要研究植被冠层间隙率（canopy gap fraction）的获取技术，利用航空LiDAR（light detection and ranging）设备的多传感器配置进行性能评估。虽然LiDAR属于遥感技术，但研究重点在于地面植被覆盖结构和光学传感器配置优化，未涉及大气环境参数（如空气质量、气溶胶分布、温室气体浓度等）的监测或分析。因此与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: Yi Li;Hao Tang;Shanshan Wei;Donghui Xie;Xihan Mu;Guangjian Yan
title: Performance assessment of canopy gap fraction retrieval using multiple airborne LiDAR instrument configurations

explanation: 该论文通过卫星遥感技术研究中国2000-2020年森林动态及其边缘效应。尽管核心主题是陆地森林变化，但卫星遥感作为大气环境遥感的关键技术手段，其应用使该研究与大气环境遥感技术领域直接相关。
authors: Jinlong Chen;Zeng Cui;Zhiyao Tang
title: Edge effects on forest dynamics in China from 2000 to 2020: Evidence from satellite remote sensing

explanation: 该论文通过GMI、AMSR2和MWRIs等多传感器微波辐射数据进行地表发射率协同反演，属于利用卫星遥感技术获取地表和大气参数的研究。微波遥感技术在反演大气湿度、云量及地表特性中广泛应用，因此与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
authors: Jiheng Hu;Rui Li;Peng Zhang;Yu Wang;Shengli Wu;Husi Letu;Fuzhong Weng
title: Global retrieval of harmonized microwave land surface emissivity leveraging multi-sensor measurements from GMI, AMSR2 and MWRIs

explanation: 该论文主要关注通过Sentinel-2卫星影像和Google Earth Engine平台生成全球10米分辨率海岸线数据集，其核心在于地理空间测绘而非大气环境监测（如空气质量、卫星大气成分分析或气溶胶反演）。海岸线数据属于地表地理信息范畴，与大气环境直接关联较弱。
authors: Yuanqiang Duan;Arturo Sanchez-Azofeifa;Chunpeng Chen;Bo Tian;Xing Li;Dhritiraj Sengupta;Yunxuan Zhou
title: S2Coast-2023: The first global 10-meter resolution coastline dataset derived from enhanced Sentinel-2 composite imagery using Google Earth Engine

explanation: 该论文主要研究东格陵兰边缘冰区中涡旋的检测与分析，采用Sentinel-1合成孔径雷达（SAR）影像和深度学习技术。虽然SAR属于遥感技术，但冰区涡旋更偏向冰川动力学或海洋学领域，未直接涉及大气环境参数（如气溶胶、空气质量、大气成分等），因此与大气环境遥感技术的相关性较低。
authors: Fei Jiang;Xiaofeng Li;Yingjie Liu;Yibin Ren
title: Deep learning detection and analysis of eddies in the East Greenland marginal ice zone from Sentinel-1 SAR imagery

explanation: 该论文通过整合多源遥感数据、机器学习算法和LGAI径流模型，开发了高分辨率地表及根系层土壤湿度监测框架。尽管研究聚焦于农业土壤湿度，但其核心技术（如卫星遥感数据同化、机器学习模型）与大气环境遥感领域高度相关，符合卫星观测、数据融合等关键技术特征。
topic_words: ['multi-source remote sensing', 'machine learning', 'Layered Green and Ampt model']
authors: Shuohao Cai;Yijia Xu;Zhengwei Yang;Wade T. Crow;Zhou Zhang;Jiali Shang;Jiangui Liu;Peter La Follette;Chris Reberg-Horton;Harry Schomberg;Steven Mirsky;Brian Davis;Sarah Seehaver;Alexis Correira;Andrea Basche;Ashley Waggoner;Charles Ellis;Dara Park;Danielle D. Treadwell;David Campbell
title: High-resolution surface and rootzone soil moisture over US cropland: A novel framework assimilating multi-source remote sensing data, machine learning, and the Layered Green and Ampt Infiltration with Redistribution model

explanation: 该研究聚焦于北极地区PlanetScope卫星图像的自动云掩膜处理技术，通过跨平台迁移学习提升模型性能。云掩膜是大气遥感数据预处理的核心环节，直接影响地表与大气参数（如气溶胶、温室气体）的提取精度。PlanetScope作为高分辨率多光谱卫星，其北极区域数据在空气质量监测、冰盖变化分析等领域具有重要价值。论文的技术路线（无标注训练+跨平台迁移）与大气遥感中新型深度学习方法的研发高度契合。
authors: Zhili Li;Yiqun Xie;Sergii Skakun;Xiaowei Jia;Gengchen Mai;William Lu;Matthew Tong;Zhihao Wang
title: Annotation-free cloud masking for PlanetScope images in the Arctic via cross-platform ability transfer using deep learning and foundation models

explanation: 该论文标题明确提到使用独立成分分析（ICA）和约束负熵优化（CoNE-opt）技术进行卫星数据产品的融合。卫星数据产品直接关联大气环境遥感技术中的卫星观测和大气成分分析，而数据融合是空气质量监测、大气参数反演等领域的核心方法。
topic_words: ['Constrained negentropy optimisation', 'satellite data products', 'independent components analysis']
authors: Suraj Shah;Yi Liu;Seokhyeon Kim;Ashish Sharma
title: Constrained negentropy optimisation (CoNE-opt): Using independent components to merge satellite data products

explanation: 该论文使用Sentinel-1卫星的干涉 coherence技术，分析了湿地洪峰动态。尽管主要关注水文监测，但Sentinel-1属于卫星遥感平台，其数据在环境监测（包括大气相关的水体变化）中属于遥感技术范畴，符合‘卫星观测’这一核心主题。
authors: Louis Gaudaré;Samuel Corgne;Marc Jolivet;Olivier Dauteuil;Cécile Doubre;Piotr Wolski;Raphaël Grandin;Marie-Pierre Doin;Philippe Durand;FLATSIM Working Group
title: Flood pulse monitoring in wetlands with multi-temporal Sentinel-1 interferometric coherence data: Application to the Okavango Delta (Botswana)

explanation: 该研究主要关注通过RADARSAT卫星的交叉极化技术对北极海冰运动的研究。尽管涉及卫星观测技术，但其核心主题是海冰动力学，属于冰川学或极地环境领域，而非直接针对大气环境监测（如空气质量、气溶胶反演等）。
authors: Alexander S. Komarov;Mathieu Plante;Jean-François Lemieux;Stephen E.L. Howell;Mike Brady
title: The role of cross-polarization in producing high-resolution pan-Arctic sea ice motion from the RADARSAT Constellation Mission over several years

explanation: 该论文利用VIIRS卫星遥感数据改进美国西部野火追踪，VIIRS属于大气环境遥感技术，直接关联卫星观测和大气监测，野火追踪涉及大气污染物（烟雾）及地表火源监测，符合大气环境遥感的范畴。
authors: Shane R. Coffield;Tempest D. McCabe;Wilfrid Schroeder;Yang Chen;Rebecca C. Scholten;Elijah Orland;Tianjia Liu;Elizabeth Wiggins;James T. Randerson;Melanie Follette-Cook;Douglas C. Morton
title: Leveraging additional VIIRS information to improve wildfire tracking in the western US

explanation: 该论文标题明确指出遥感技术在碳量（如森林碳汇量）和质量（如碳信用真实性）建模中的作用，属于大气环境遥感中碳循环监测的核心领域。碳信用评估需依赖大气成分（如CO2、CH4）的遥感反演技术，与卫星观测、大气成分分析等技术直接相关。
authors: Peng Fu;Carl Bernacchi;Brendan Malone;James Kellner;Uta Heiden
title: Preface: The role of remote sensing to improve modeling of carbon quantities and quality of carbon credits

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要聚焦于树木分支尺度生长策略的定量结构模型时间序列分析，主要涉及植物生物学和环境模型构建，未直接提及大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、气溶胶反演、空气质量监测等）。其研究主题更偏向生态学而非大气环境遥感领域。
topic_words: ['boundary conditions', 'tree quantitative structure model', 'time series analysis']
authors: Hanna Elisabet Sorokina;Mariana Campos;Pasi Raumonen;Anna Shcherbacheva;Rami Echriti;Juha Hyyppä;Eetu Puttonen;Yunsheng Wang
title: Boundary conditions for studying branch-scale tree growth strategies using tree quantitative structure model time series

explanation: 该研究主要关注地理区域（东部藏区交通走廊）的高温热损伤风险预测，涉及地表温度、地形和植被覆盖分析。虽然可能使用遥感数据（如卫星监测的地表温度），但其核心是环境风险评估与机器学习模型结合，未直接涉及大气成分监测、污染气体反演或卫星观测技术，因此与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
topic_words: ['卷积神经网络', '位置信息融合', '高温热损伤预测']
authors: Zhe Chen;Si Guo;Huadong Guo;Zhengbo Yu;Xiangqi Lei;Qingyun Ji;Ziqiong He;Ruichun Chang;Zhongchang Sun;Xiangjun Pei;Zhongli Zhou;Lorenzo Picco
title: Prediction and interpretation of high-temperature heat damage risk zones in the Eastern Tibetan Transport Corridor based on a location-information-fusion convolution neural network

explanation: 该研究使用SDGSAT-1卫星的Glimmer图像估计道路灯光密度和数量，属于城市基础设施监测范畴，未直接涉及大气环境参数（如空气质量、气溶胶、大气成分分析等），因此相关性较低。
authors: Ziqi Yin;Mingquan Wu;Zheng Niu;Li Wang;Changyong Dou
title: Streetlight density and quantity estimation using glimmer images from SDGSAT-1

explanation: 该论文研究合成孔径雷达（SAR）在热带气旋研究中的应用。SAR作为遥感技术，常用于大气环境监测（如云层结构、水汽分布等），而热带气旋涉及大气动力学和气象参数分析，属于大气环境遥感的范畴。
authors: Alexis Mouche;Arthur Avenas;Paul Chang;Bertrand Chapron;Théo Cévaër;Clément Combot;Joseph Courtney;Quentin Febvre;Ralph C. Foster;Antoine Grouazel;Masahiro Hayashi;Takeshi Horinouchi;Yasutaka Ikuta;Isoguchi Osamu;Christopher R. Jackson;Zorana Jelenak;John A. Knaff;Sébastien Langlade;Jean-Renaud Miadana;Frédéric Nouguier
title: Fostering tropical cyclone research and applications with Synthetic Aperture Radar

explanation: 该论文使用Sentinel-1双极化SAR图像对北极冬季海冰进行分类，属于卫星遥感技术应用于环境监测的范畴。虽然主要研究对象是海冰（冰冻圈），但其采用的SAR遥感技术（卫星观测手段）与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星大气成分分析、气溶胶反演）在方法论上具有关联性，且海冰变化与大气环境（如气候模型、温室气体效应）密切相关。
authors: Yan Dai;Xiao-Ming Li;Haotian Yuan
title: Pan-Arctic winter sea ice classification using Sentinel-1 dual-polarized SAR images

explanation: 该论文聚焦于Sentinel-1卫星的洪水自动监测服务，尽管涉及卫星遥感技术（如SAR），但其核心应用是地表水文监测而非大气环境参数（如空气质量、温室气体、气溶胶等）。因此，与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: Wolfgang Wagner;Bernhard Bauer-Marschallinger;Florian Roth;Tobias Raiger-Stachl;Christoph Reimer;Niall McCormick;Patrick Matgen;Marco Chini;Yu Li;Sandro Martinis;Marc Wieland;Franziska Kraft;Davide Festa;Muhammed Hassaan;Mark Edwin Tupas;Jie Zhao;Michaela Seewald;Michael Riffler;Luca Molini;Richard Kidd
title: The fully-automatic Sentinel-1 Global Flood Monitoring service: Scientific challenges and future directions

explanation: 该论文针对Sentinel-3卫星的带状数据提出了一种概率加权区域插值方法，用于无缝生成大气环境监测所需的格网化数据。Sentinel-3卫星的SLSTR和OLCI传感器具备大气参数观测能力，而无缝映射技术对空气质量监测、大气成分反演等应用至关重要。论文的核心贡献在于改进了传统插值算法，提升了大气遥感数据处理的连续性和精度。
authors: Dong Li;Anirudh Belwalkar;Tao Cheng;Kang Yu
title: PAGrid: A probabilistic area-weighted gridding method for seamless mapping of sentinel-3 swath data

explanation: 该论文研究Sentinel-1卫星数据反演土壤湿度的技术，虽直接主题为土壤参数，但卫星遥感技术（如雷达观测）与大气环境监测技术存在方法论共通性，且Sentinel系列卫星常被用于大气边界层参数的反演研究。
authors: Mehdi Rahmati;Anna Balenzano;Michel Bechtold;Luca Brocca;Anke Fluhrer;Thomas Jagdhuber;Kleanthis Karamvasis;David Mengen;Rolf H. Reichle;Seung-bum Kim;Ruhollah Taghizadeh-Mehrjardi;Jeffrey Walker;Liujun Zhu;Carsten Montzka
title: Soil moisture retrieval from Sentinel-1: Lessons learned after more than a decade in orbit

explanation: 该论文探讨远程 sensing 在 boreal 林业排水泥炭地恢复中的应用，主要关注植被恢复、水文变化等陆地生态系统监测，而非大气成分分析、空气质量管理或卫星观测中的大气参数。因此，相关性较弱。
authors: Lauri Ikkala;Ismail;Franziska Wolff;Hannu Marttila;Anna-Kaisa Ronkanen;Pavel Alekseychik;Parvez Rana;Marko Kohv;Teemu Tahvanainen;Anne Tolvanen;Ali Torabi Haghighi;Timo Kumpula;Christopher Osborne;Jari Ilmonen;Tuomas Haapalehto;Bjørn Kløve;Aleksi Räsänen
title: Remote sensing applications for monitoring restoration outcomes in boreal forestry-drained peatlands - Reviewed applications and future potential

explanation: 该论文主要研究地下水流失导致的地面沉降问题，采用InSAR技术进行地表形变监测。虽然InSAR属于遥感技术，但其应用场景聚焦于地质工程和环境工程领域（如地面沉降评估），而非大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分分析、气溶胶反演等）。因此，论文核心内容与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
topic_words: ['InSAR', 'groundwater volume loss', 'land subsidence', 'mechanical modeling', 'North China plain']
authors: Xing Zhang;Jun Hu;Mahdi Motagh;Mingjia Li;Yuedong Wang;Qiuhong Yang;Guangli Su;Haigang Wang
title: Groundwater volume loss and land subsidence in the North China plain investigated using wide-area InSAR surveying and mechanical modeling

explanation: 该研究探讨被动卫星观测中忽略气溶胶与云共存现象对地表太阳辐射估算的影响，直接涉及卫星遥感技术在大气环境监测（如气溶胶遥感反演、辐射传输模型修正）中的应用，与题干定义的领域高度相关。
topic_words: ['aerosol-cloud coexistence', 'passive satellite observations', 'surface solar radiation estimates']
authors: Qin Lang;Ming Zhang;Qiuhua He;Shikuan Jin;Wenmin Qin;Lingxia Luo;Lunche Wang
title: Significant uncertainties from overlooking aerosol-cloud coexistence in surface solar radiation estimates using passive satellite observations

explanation: 该研究结合R-VSPI和VSPI遥感指数，用于量化澳大利亚东南部森林火灾严重程度。VSPI是一种基于光谱遥感的植被火指数，属于大气环境遥感技术范畴。通过卫星或航空遥感数据估算火灾影响，涉及大气成分分析和地表火监测技术，与题目要求的相关领域强相关。
authors: Aakash Chhabra;Christoph Rüdiger;James Hilton;Rachael H. Nolan;Eli R. Bendall;Marta Yebra;Thomas Jagdhuber
title: Combined use of R-VSPI and VSPI for enhanced quantification of fire severity in south-eastern Australian forests

explanation: 该论文聚焦于通过三维建模和群体指数（GAI）优化来提升小麦作物的估算精度，虽然涉及遥感模型应用，但未明确提及大气环境参数（如气溶胶、PM2.5、卫星大气校正等）或直接关联空气质量管理、卫星观测等核心大气环境遥感技术领域。研究更偏向农业模型优化而非大气环境监测.
authors: Mingxia Dong;Shouyang Liu;Marie Weiss;Aojie Yin;Chen Zhu;Benoit de Solan;Wei Guo;Fernandes Richard;Wenjuan Li;Xia Yao;James Burridge;Zhen Chen;Yanfeng Ding;Frédéric Baret
title: Integrating prior information for improving 3D model-driven GAI estimation with application to wheat crops

explanation: 该研究聚焦于城市规模与植被覆盖对地表热影响的非线性关系，虽涉及地表温度（surface temperature）和植被覆盖（vegetation cover），但未明确使用遥感技术（如卫星观测、传感器数据）或大气环境分析（如气溶胶、温室气体）。其方法可能基于城市统计数据和植被指数模型，而非大气遥感领域核心技术。
authors: Song Jiang;Yongling Zhao;Lei Zhao;Dominik Strebel;Dominique Derome;Diana Ürge-Vorsatz;Jan Carmeliet;Jian Peng
title: Nonlinear impacts of urban size and vegetation cover on global surface urban heat: Insights from 6022 cities

explanation: 该论文主要研究利用空间搭载高光谱影像技术评估森林生态系统中的叶片和冠层特征，其核心应用方向为植被生态监测，而非直接针对大气环境要素（如空气质量、大气成分、气溶胶反演等）的遥感技术分析。
authors: Giulia Tagliabue;Cinzia Panigada;Beatrice Savinelli;Luigi Vignali;Micol Rossini
title: Appraising retrieval schemes from spaceborne hyperspectral imagery for mapping leaf and canopy traits in forest ecosystems

explanation: 该论文使用卫星遥感技术监测格陵兰冬季埋藏湖排水及其对冰川流动的潜在影响。虽然研究重点在于冰川动力学和地表水循环，但卫星遥感作为关键技术手段，属于大气环境遥感领域中的卫星观测技术范畴，符合空气质量管理、卫星观测等子主题。
authors: Jianing Wei;Kang Yang;Yuxin Zhu;Yuhan Wang;Xiaoyu Guo
title: Satellite monitoring of Greenland wintertime buried lake drainage and potential ice flow response

explanation: 该论文主要关注基于遥感技术的多模态元表征方法（MetaRS）在缺失数据条件下的土地覆盖映射应用，其核心围绕地球观测数据集（EarthMiss）和地表覆盖解译展开。虽然使用了遥感技术，但研究重点在于地表覆盖的定量化与数据补全，并未涉及大气成分分析、卫星定量化观测或污染监测等直接相关的环境大气领域。
authors: Yiheng Zhou;Ailong Ma;Junjue Wang;Zihang Chen;Yanfei Zhong
title: Remote sensing meta modal representation for missing modality land cover mapping: From EarthMiss dataset to MetaRS method

explanation: 该论文提出地面-卫星融合算法用于每日地表植被指数的反演，涉及遥感数据融合技术。植被指数监测需大气校正支持，而融合地面观测与卫星数据可有效处理大气干扰（如气溶胶影响），属于大气环境遥感中的地表参数反演与大气校正交叉领域。
authors: Wenjuan Li;Marie Weiss;Samuel Buis;Aleixandre Verger;Sylvain Jay;Zihan Ren;Wenbin Wu;Jingyi Jiang;Alexis Comar;Benoit De Solan
title: NRT-GSF: A novel near-real-time ground-satellite fusion algorithm to retrieve daily green area index at field scale

explanation: 该论文主要研究基于航空LiDAR数据的森林三维植被叶面积密度产品，属于地表植被监测与三维建模领域，未直接涉及大气环境（如空气质量、卫星观测、大气成分或气溶胶反演）相关技术或应用。LiDAR虽为遥感技术，但其应用场景聚焦森林生态，与大气环境监测的核心目标（污染物分析、大气成分测量等）关联较弱。
authors: Cailin Zhou;Tiangang Yin;Shanshan Wei;Bruce D. Cook;Weiwei Tan;Wai Yeung Yan;Qi Chen;Jean-Philippe Gastellu-Etchegorry
title: FoScenes: A high-fidelity, large-scale 3D forest plant area density product derived from open-access airborne lidar data

explanation: 该研究聚焦于油seed rape的植被指数反演，采用微波散射多层模型结合物候期优化。虽然涉及微波遥感技术（与大气遥感相关技术有部分交叉），但其核心目标是农业植被监测，属于地表观测范畴，而非直接针对大气环境参数（如污染物、温室气体、大气成分分析等）的遥感技术研究。
authors: Rongkun Zhao;Shangrong Wu;Yun Shao;Xuexiao Wu;Yan Zha;Zhiqu Liu;Ming Liu;Yongli Guo;Lang Xia;Wenbin Wu;Peng Yang;Huajun Tang
title: Inversion of total photosynthetic area index of oilseed rape based on a multilayer microwave scattering semiempirical model adapted to each phenological stage

explanation: 该论文聚焦于沙漠灌木场景的定向反射率建模，提出了一种基于核驱动BRDF的一般框架，主要涉及地表反射特性的机器学习方法。虽然BRDF模型与遥感技术相关，但研究核心是植被地表反射机制，未直接涉及大气环境监测（如污染物、卫星大气成分分析、气溶胶反演等关键领域）。
authors: Henggang Zhang;Xu Ma;Huaguo Huang;Ziti Jiao;Fei Zhang
title: A method to model the directional reflectance for desert shrub scenes in a general framework of kernel-driven BRDF model

explanation: 该论文主要关注土壤实验室与卫星光谱数据的过滤及质量协议（SQuaP），重点在于土壤分析中的光谱数据预处理和标准化，而非直接涉及大气环境监测（如空气质量、卫星大气成分分析或气溶胶反演）。尽管使用了卫星数据，但其应用场景属于陆地环境（土壤）而非大气环境，因此相关性较弱。
authors: Bruno dos Anjos Bartsch;José A.M. Demattê;Nikolaos Tziolas;Jorge Tadeu Fim Rosas;Gabriel Pimenta Barbosa de Sousa;Nicolas Augusto Rosin;Giannis Gallios;Borges Marfrann Dias Melo
title: Soil laboratory and satellite spectral data filtering: A Spectral Quality Protocol (SQuaP)

explanation: 该研究主要利用热红外卫星观测数据反演灌溉时间，属于农业遥感和水文监测领域，未直接涉及大气环境参数（如污染物、温室气体、气象要素等）的遥感技术或分析。
authors: Ehsan Jalilvand;Sujay V. Kumar;Charles Truong;Erin Haacker;Sarith Mahanama
title: Characterization of irrigation timing using thermal satellite observations, a data-driven approach

explanation: 该论文基于Sentinel-1 SAR卫星数据研究土壤湿度反演，虽然涉及遥感技术，但核心是地表参数（土壤湿度）与地表覆盖类型的关联，属于地球观测和地表过程研究，而非直接针对大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分分析或气溶胶反演）的范畴。
authors: Zhihao Shen;Qisheng He;Chenghui Yang;Zihao Cheng
title: Soil moisture retrieval under different land cover conditions based on Sentinel-1 SAR

explanation: 该论文通过空间搭载的PRISMA和NEON AOP传感器，研究植被特性的季节变化及其在不同森林类型和生态区中的差异。虽然核心主题是植物特征，但使用卫星遥感技术（如大气成分分析中常用的AOP传感器）直接关联到大气环境遥感技术，尤其是通过植被监测间接支持大气环境模型或生态-大气相互作用分析。
authors: Fujiang Ji;Ting Zheng;Alexey N. Shiklomanov;Ruqi Yang;Philip A. Townsend;Fa Li;Dalei Hao;Hamid Dashti;Kyle R. Kovach;Hangkai You;Junxiong Zhou;Min Chen
title: Tracking seasonal variability in plant traits from spaceborne PRISMA and NEON AOP across forest types and ecoregions

explanation: 该论文主要研究我国东北部白音呼海公路沿线永久冻土变形的多源评估。永久冻土变形属于地质工程或环境地质领域，虽然可能涉及遥感技术（如卫星或地面传感器监测地表位移），但其核心关注点是冻土物理变形及工程影响，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、大气成分分析、气溶胶反演等）的关联较弱。大气环境遥感技术更侧重于通过卫星或传感器获取大气参数（如污染物浓度、温室气体、气溶胶分布等），而非直接监测地表冻土变形。
authors: Aoxiang Yan;Shanzhen Li;Xiaoying Jin;Shuai Huang;Wenhui Wang;Jianjun Tang;Anyuan Li;Ze Zhang;Shengrong Zhang;Jinbang Zhai;Lanzhi Lü;Ruixia He;Xiaoying Li;Wei Shan;Ying Guo;Huijun Jin
title: Multi-source assessment of permafrost deformation along the Bei'an–Hei'he highway in Northeast China

explanation: 该研究探讨大气干旱对阔叶林冠层叶绿素荧光和GPP的影响，涉及遥感监测的关键参数（如叶绿素荧光和GPP）和气象条件（大气干旱、热浪）。叶绿素荧光常通过高光谱遥感或激光雷达技术测量，GPP的遥感估算依赖卫星数据和模型，因此与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
topic_words: ['canopy chlorophyll fluorescence', 'Gross Primary Production', 'atmospheric dryness', 'remote sensing', 'heat waves']
authors: Zhaohui Li;Gabriel Hmimina;Gwendal Latouche;Daniel Berveiller;Abderrahmane Ounis;Yves Goulas;Kamel Soudani
title: Atmospheric dryness effects on canopy chlorophyll fluorescence and Gross Primary Production (GPP) in a deciduous forest during heat waves

explanation: 该研究聚焦于江汉平原耕种-养殖复合种植模式引发的土地利用变化分析，主要采用稳健分类框架进行地表覆盖类型识别。虽然涉及遥感技术（如卫星影像解译）和空间分析，但其核心目标是揭示农业用地结构与人类活动的关系，未直接涉及大气环境参数（如污染物浓度、气溶胶分布、温室气体监测等），亦未明确使用大气环境遥感传感器（如MODIS、Sentinel等）或专用算法（如大气校正模型）。因此，与大气环境遥感技术关联性较弱。
authors: Yanbing Wei;Wenjuan Li;Peng Zhu;Qiangyi Yu;Wenbin Wu
title: Characterizing land use changes triggered by crop-aquaculture co-cultivation from 2013 to 2022 based on a robust classification framework: Illustration in Jianghan Plain, China

explanation: 该论文聚焦于欧洲地区基于地球观测产品（遥感数据）的超分辨率水文建模比较。虽然涉及遥感技术，但其核心应用方向是水文模型（hydrological modelling），而非直接关联大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分分析、卫星反演技术等）。关键词如'hydrological'表明研究重点在水文领域，与大气环境遥感技术存在间接关联但非强相关。
authors: Almudena García-García;Pietro Stradiotti;Federico Di Paolo;Paolo Filippucci;Milan Fischer;Matěj Orság;Luca Brocca;Jian Peng;Wouter Dorigo;Alexander Gruber;Bram Droppers;Niko Wanders;Arjen Haag;Albrecht Weerts;Ehsan Modiri;Oldrich Rakovec;Félix Francés;Matteo Dall’Amico;Martha Anderson;Christopher Hain
title: Intercomparison of Earth Observation products for hyper-resolution hydrological modelling over Europe

explanation: 该论文主要研究在未调查区域使用基于合成数据的网络模型监测作物生长进度，核心关注农业遥感应用。虽然涉及遥感技术（如卫星或传感器数据），但未明确提及大气环境参数（如空气质量、气溶胶、温室气体等）的监测、分析或反演。因此，与大气环境遥感技术的直接关联较弱。
authors: George Worrall;Jasmeet Judge
title: In-season crop progress in unsurveyed regions using networks trained on synthetic data

explanation: 该论文主要研究合成孔径雷达（SAR）的C波段和L波段双极化数据在热带地区早期森林砍伐检测中的应用。尽管SAR属于遥感技术范畴，但其研究重点在于地表植被变化监测而非大气环境参数（如气溶胶、温室气体、空气质量等）。因此，该研究更偏向地表变化遥感而非大气环境遥感技术领域。
authors: Africa I. Flores-Anderson;Jeffrey A. Cardille;Josef Kellndorfer;Franz J. Meyer;Pontus Olofsson
title: On the sensitivity of SAR C- and L-band dual-polarized data for detection of early deforestation in the tropics

explanation: 该论文主要使用InSAR技术（干涉合成孔径雷达）对美国的地面沉降进行全国范围的 mapping 和特征分析。尽管InSAR属于遥感技术，但其应用场景聚焦于地表沉降（地质/地球物理问题），而非大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分、气溶胶反演等）。因此，该研究属于地球观测领域，与题目要求的大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: Zhiqiang Xiong;Guangcai Feng;Zefa Yang;Hua Gao;Wenbin Xu;Lei Zhang;Xiaohua Xu;Zhong Lu;Jun Hu;Zhiwei Li;Jianjun Zhu
title: Nationwide mapping and characterization of land subsidence in the United States using InSAR

explanation: 该论文利用MODIS卫星遥感数据，通过约束的深度神经网络算法联合反演地表辐射预算的各分量（如太阳辐射、地表反射、长波辐射等），属于大气环境遥感技术中卫星数据反演与辐射传输模型的研究范畴。MODIS是大气环境监测的重要卫星传感器，辐射预算分析直接关联大气能量平衡与气溶胶/温室气体等参数的反演。
topic_words: ['MODIS', '地表辐射预算', '深度神经网络']
authors: Jianglei Xu;Shunlin Liang;Han Ma;Yongzhe Chen;Wenyuan Li;Yichuan Ma;Xiang Zhao;Bo Jiang;Xiaotong Zhang;Shikang Guan
title: Joint estimation of global daily 1 km surface radiation budget components from MODIS observations (2000−2023) using conservation-constrained deep neural networks

explanation: 该研究通过三重集合分析和跨数据集比较减少火灾辐射功率检测偏差，属于大气遥感技术中的辐射反演与数据融合方法。火灾辐射功率评估与气溶胶、大气成分的遥感监测密切相关，涉及卫星观测和大气环境分析技术。
authors: Yoojin Kang;Jaese Lee;Jungho Im
title: Comprehensive global fire radiative power evaluation by minimizing detection bias with intercomparison and extended triple collocation analysis

explanation: 该论文聚焦于加利福尼亚州异质景观中木质植被和建筑结构的亚米级制图，使用深度学习技术进行地表覆盖分类。其研究属于陆域遥感（terrestrial remote sensing）范畴，主要涉及植被监测和地表结构解析，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星大气成分分析、气溶胶反演等）无直接关联。论文的核心贡献在于高精度地形数据的地物识别，而非大气参数或环境质量的遥感反演。
authors: Yunzhe Zhu;Dan J. Dixon;Yufang Jin
title: Scalable sub-meter mapping of woody vegetation and structures across California’s heterogeneous landscape using deep learning

explanation: 该论文通过MISR（中分辨率成像光谱辐射计）和GEDI（全球钻探设备）卫星数据评估南美地区森林地上生物量，并结合NASA碳监测系统数据。MISR和GEDI均属于卫星遥感技术，其中MISR具备气溶胶、植被、大气垂直结构等监测能力，GEDI提供地形高程数据，这些技术均可用于大气环境参数（如气溶胶、碳通量）的遥感反演。森林生物量分析涉及植被碳汇评估，与大气碳循环直接相关，属于大气环境遥感技术应用范畴。
topic_words: ['MISR', 'GEDI', 'NASA Carbon Monitoring System', 'forest aboveground biomass', 'aerosol retrieval']
authors: Mark J. Chopping;Zhuosen Wang;Crystal B. Schaaf;Michael Bull
title: Forest aboveground biomass in the southwestern U.S. from MISR and GEDI: Assessment with NASA Carbon Monitoring System data

explanation: 该论文研究利用Sentinel-2卫星多光谱影像进行火灾区域测绘，属于大气环境遥感技术范畴。火灾烟雾中的气溶胶、二氧化碳等成分可通过卫星遥感反演，与大气污染监测直接相关。
authors: Peng Liu;Yongxue Liu;Xiaoxiao Guo;Yuchen Liu;Wanjing Zhao;Wenxuan Xu
title: Faster, better, and more accurate mapping of burned areas using Sentinel-2 multispectral images

explanation: 该论文研究海冰上雪层效应对测高仪雷达波形的影响，属于卫星遥感技术（测高仪）的应用分析。测高卫星常用于监测海洋环境（如海冰厚度、冰面雪覆盖）和环境变化，与大气环境遥感中的海洋-大气相互作用研究相关。雷达波形分解是关键的遥感反演技术，涉及大气参数与地表的相互作用分析。
authors: Lu Zhou;Henriette Skourup;Julienne Stroeve;Sahra Kacimi;Stefanie Arndt;Weixin Zhu;Alek Petty;Lanqing Huang;Shiming Xu
title: Snow effects on altimeter waveforms over sea ice in the Weddell Sea — Part I: Radar waveform decomposition

explanation: 该论文聚焦于利用DEASE方法估算城市地表热岛强度、影响范围及容量，而城市热岛效应与大气环境密切相关，通常通过卫星遥感或地面传感器进行观测分析。虽然摘要未明确提及遥感技术，但研究热岛效应通常依赖大气环境监测技术（如卫星观测、遥感算法），因此属于相关领域。
authors: Qiquan Yang;Richen Ye;TC Chakraborty;Ting Hu;Yue Liu
title: Estimation of intensity, footprint, and capacity of surface urban heat islands using a direction-enhanced adaptive synchronous extraction (DEASE) method

explanation: 该论文通过多源数据评估了欧洲地区云和气溶胶对太阳辐射趋势的影响，涉及大气成分分析。云和气溶胶是空气质量监测和大气成分分析的关键研究对象，而卫星遥感技术正是用于此类参数的观测和反演，因此与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
authors: Leandro C. Segado-Moreno;José A. Ruiz-Arias;Juan Pedro Montávez;Juraj Betak
title: Past, current and future solar radiation trends in Europe: Multi-source assessment of the role of clouds and aerosols

explanation: 论文标题明确提到使用遥感信号（remote sensing signals）分析火灾后桉树恢复（post-fire recovery）中的结构（structural）与功能（functional）特征。虽然研究重点在植被生态恢复，但遥感技术用于监测地表变化（如植被覆盖、地表温度等）可能间接关联大气环境参数（如大气成分分析）。关键词中包含'atmospheric composition analysis'，符合大气环境遥感的范畴。
authors: Feng Qiu;Jinlong Zang;Yongguang Zhang
title: Divergent remote sensing signals in long-term post-fire Eucalyptus recovery: Structural vs. functional traits

explanation: 该论文标题提到融合SAR（合成孔径雷达）和光学遥感的不规则异步时间序列以重构反射率，SAR和光学传感器常用于大气环境监测（如地表覆盖、植被指数、大气成分分析）。通过融合多源遥感数据的时间序列，可以更准确地重建地表或大气参数，这对空气质量管理、卫星观测和大气成分分析有直接应用价值。
authors: Kai Tang;Xuehong Chen;Tianyu Liu;Anqi Li;Yao Tang;Peng Yang;Jin Chen
title: AnytimeFormer: Fusing irregular and asynchronous SAR-optical time series to reconstruct reflectance at any given time

explanation: 该论文研究光谱与整合太阳诱导叶绿素荧光（SIF）之间的关系，并探讨其用于光合作用估算的应用。SIF是植被光合作用的直接指标，光谱分析技术（如卫星遥感中的光谱测量）是大气环境遥感的重要手段，用于植被监测、光合效率评估及生态系统研究，与大气环境遥感技术直接相关。
authors: Ji Li;Lianhong Gu;Jing M. Chen;Yongguang Zhang
title: The relationship between spectral and integrated sun-induced chlorophyll fluorescence and its implication for photosynthesis estimation using fluorescence observations

explanation: 该论文利用Sentinel-2卫星的合成数据及数据平衡技术，针对农田土壤有机碳和黏土含量的预测偏差进行优化。尽管研究核心为土壤参数，但Sentinel-2作为遥感卫星传感器，其数据在环境监测（如地表覆盖分类、土壤特性分析）中的应用属于大气环境遥感技术范畴。论文直接涉及卫星数据（Sentinel-2）与地表环境参数（有机碳、黏土）的定量分析，符合卫星观测、遥感数据应用和环境成分分析的研究方向。
authors: Tom Broeg;Axel Don;Thomas Scholten;Stefan Erasmi
title: Reducing bias in cropland soil organic carbon and clay predictions using Sentinel-2 composites and data balancing

explanation: 该研究聚焦于无人机搭载的GPR（接地雷达）技术测量土壤湿度以优化灌溉，属于地表 environmental monitoring范畴。虽然涉及遥感技术（无人机平台），但核心是土壤湿度（地表参数）和农业应用（precision irrigation），与大气环境遥感（如卫星观测、气溶胶反演等大气成分或污染物监测）无直接关联。
authors: Kaijun Wu;Jean Artois;Denis Tourneur;Merlin Mareschal;Maud Henrion;Sashini Pathirana;Lakshman Galagedara;Quentin Limbourg;Sébastien Lambot
title: Automated drone-borne GPR mapping of root-zone soil moisture for precision irrigation

explanation: 该论文主要研究SWOT卫星的Surface Water和Ocean Topography数据在洪水范围提取中的应用，SWOT卫星属于重力卫星，其核心功能是测量海面高度和地表形变，与大气环境监测（如空气质量、温室气体、气溶胶等）无直接关联。
topic_words: ['Surface Water', 'Ocean Topography', 'SWOT Pixel Cloud', 'flood extent extraction']
authors: Quentin Bonassies;Christophe Fatras;Santiago Peña-Luque;Pierre Dubois;Andrea Piacentini;Ludovic Cassan;Sophie Ricci;Thanh Huy Nguyen
title: A comprehensive study of Surface Water and Ocean Topography (SWOT) Pixel Cloud data for flood extent extraction

explanation: 该研究聚焦于天空黑暗度评估和暗空公园选址，虽涉及空间数据整合与机器学习模型，但未明确提及大气环境参数（如污染物浓度、气溶胶分布、卫星遥感观测等）。主题更偏向光学观测与地理空间分析，而非直接的大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星大气成分反演）
topic_words: ['dark sky quality', 'multi-source spatial data', 'random forest model']
authors: Zhaobo Li;Ruihan Xing;Qiyao Ling;Ziran Wei;Zuo Wang;Qing Ji;Kaifang Shi
title: Exploring global dark sky quality and potential dark sky park site selection: Integrating multi-source spatial data with random forest model

explanation: 该论文主要研究通过InSAR闭合相位来建模、预测和反演地表土壤湿度。尽管InSAR（干涉合成孔径雷达）属于遥感技术，但其应用聚焦于地表土壤湿度这一陆地水文参数，而非直接涉及大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分分析、卫星观测等）。土壤湿度更多与地球观测和农业应用相关，而非题目中要求的「大气环境」范畴。
authors: Yujie Zheng;Heresh Fattahi
title: Modeling, prediction, and retrieval of surface soil moisture from InSAR closure phase

explanation: 该研究主要关注通过可微分的3D辐射传输模型从冠层反射中提取叶片和土壤的光谱特性，属于地表参数反演和植被遥感技术。虽然涉及辐射传输模型（可能与大气遥感中的辐射传输计算相关），但其核心应用是地表光谱分析，未明确涉及大气环境监测（如污染物、大气成分或卫星遥感中的大气校正）。因此，与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: Jianbo Qi;Jifan Wei;Mengqi Xia;Donghui Xie
title: Retrieving fine-scale leaf and soil spectral properties from canopy reflectance with differentiable 3D radiative transfer

explanation: 该论文标题和研究摘要均聚焦于欧洲潮间带海草的初步地图绘制，属于海洋生态遥感与生物学范畴。虽然使用了遥感技术（如卫星或无人机影像分析），但其核心研究对象为海草分布和生物多样性，而非大气环境参数（如空气质量、气溶胶、温室气体等）。因此，与大气环境遥感技术的直接关联性较弱。
authors: Bede Ffinian Rowe Davies;Simon Oiry;Mar Roca;Philippe Rosa;Maria Laura Zoffoli;Dimitris Poursanidis;Tobias Dolch;Bárbara Ondiviela;Cristina Galván;Ana C. Brito;Richard J. Lilley;Laura L. Govers;Martin Gade;Laurent Barillé;Pierre Gernez

topic_words: ['longwave cloud radiative forcing', 'radiative forcing estimation', 'satellite algorithm', 'atmospheric radiative balance']
authors: Chuanye Shi;Tianxing Wang;Zheng Li;Dahui Li;Husi Letu
title: Towards an easy-to-use algorithm to estimate longwave cloud radiative forcing: algorithm development and preliminary evaluation

title: AI in soil moisture remote sensing

explanation: 该论文主要研究通过改进的卷积神经网络（FADConv）对耕地非农业化进行识别和分割。虽然涉及遥感图像处理技术（如动态卷积），但其应用场景聚焦于土地利用变化分析，未直接涉及大气环境参数监测（如空气质量、卫星大气成分分析或气溶胶反演），因此与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: Tan Shu;Li Shen;Yong Wang;Peng Zhang
title: FADConv: A frequency-aware dynamic convolution for cropland non-agriculturalization identification and segmentation

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文研究海草损失与人类活动及环境驱动因素的关联，采用深度学习方法分析南沙群岛的案例。虽然涉及环境数据和机器学习，但核心研究对象是海洋生态系统中的海草，未涉及大气遥感技术相关的方法（如卫星传感器、气溶胶反演、大气成分分析等），也未明确使用大气环境遥感数据或技术。
topic_words: ['海草损失', '领域适应深度学习', 'Nansha islands']

title: Human impacts versus environmental drivers of seagrass loss in the Nansha islands: Evidence from domain-adaptive deep learning

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文通过整合草地高度数据来提升地上生物量估算，草地高度的监测通常依赖遥感技术（如卫星观测或地面传感器），而地上生物量是生态系统碳汇能力评估的重要组成部分。尽管研究主题聚焦植被监测，但其在遥感数据采集、处理算法（如融合多源数据）以及地表参数反演方面的应用，与大气环境遥感技术（如植被指数计算、地表参数反演）存在直接关联，属于环境遥感技术的细分领域。
authors: Wuhua Wang;Jiakui Tang;Na Zhang;Xuefeng Xu;Anan Zhang;Yanjiao Wang;Yidan Wang;Shuohao Cai;Sandipan Mukharjee;Rajiv Pandey;Tong Li

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文研究机载LiDAR（激光雷达）的辐射效应对强度数据间隙概率的影响，LiDAR常用于大气环境监测（如气溶胶分布、边界层结构分析），而辐射效应修正和间隙概率估计是数据处理的关键步骤，直接关联大气遥感技术的准确性和应用。
authors: Lijie Guo;Lei Deng
title: An improved gap probability estimation method accounting for radiometric effects in airborne LiDAR intensity

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要均未涉及大气环境遥感技术相关内容，如卫星观测、空气质量监测、大气成分分析或气溶胶反演等。其研究重点集中在基于视频片段的道路标记检测和大型语言模型（LLM）驱动的驾驶提示生成，属于自动驾驶或计算机视觉领域，与大气环境遥感无直接关联。

authors: Ramin Farhadiani;Sayyed Mohammad Javad Mirzadeh;Ehsan Roshani;Daniel Cusson;Saeid Homayouni

authors: Luca Fibbi;Marta Chiesi;Maurizio Pieri;Giorgio Bartolini;Daniele Grifoni;Bernardo Gozzini;Fabio Maselli

explanation: 该研究主要关注葡萄园土壤基质对植被生长的影响，使用Sentinel-2卫星时间序列和地表物候学分析，属于农业遥感和地表过程监测领域。虽然涉及卫星遥感技术，但核心问题集中在土壤与植被的相互作用，而非大气环境参数（如空气质量、气溶胶、温室气体等）的遥感反演或监测，因此与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: Thomas Maffei;Marco Moretto;Pietro Franceschi
title: Monitoring soil substrate influence in vineyards using Sentinel-2 time series and land surface phenology

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文通过融合Sentinel-1雷达数据和Sentinel-2光学卫星数据，实现了NDVI（植被指数）的高分辨率重建和景观驱动的碳通量评估。NDVI直接关联植被覆盖与大气碳交换，而Sentinel系列卫星是国际主流大气环境遥感监测平台，其雷达-光学融合技术对大气参数反演（如植被碳汇、地表湿度等）具有重要应用价值。研究地点马来西亚的 Selangor 地区涉及复杂生态系统，符合大气环境遥感技术的研究场景。
authors: Pengfei Jia;Helmi Zulhaidi Mohd Shafri;Shengrui Yu;Zhi Zheng;Shiqing You;Abdul Rashid Mohamed Shariff
title: Radar-optical fusion of Sentinel-1/2 for high-resolution NDVI reconstruction and landscape-driven carbon flux assessment in Kuala Selangor, Malaysia (2020–2024)

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究主要关注瑞士山区森林冠层的检测与制图，使用航空激光扫描技术（ airborne laser scanning ）分析地表植被结构。其核心内容属于地理信息系统（GIS）和生态遥感范畴，未涉及大气环境参数（如空气质量、气体成分、气溶胶分布等）的监测、反演或分析技术。因此，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、污染物遥感监测）的关联性较弱。
topic_words: ['forest canopy detection', 'airborne laser scanning', 'Swiss mountain forests']
authors: Alexander Bast;Martina L. Hobi;Christian Ginzler;Livia Piermattei;Christoph Fischer;Petia S. Nikolova;Leon J. Bührle;Tobias Kalt;Frank Graf
title: An approach to detect and map forest canopy layers in Swiss mountain forests using nationwide airborne laser scanning data

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注植物花色指数在跨尺度监测暖色开花现象中的应用，属于生态学或农业领域的生物监测技术。其研究内容未涉及卫星遥感、大气成分分析、气溶胶反演或空气质量监测等大气环境遥感技术相关的方法或应用。
authors: Bina Thapa;Brady S. Hardiman;Songlin Fei
title: Flower color index for detecting and monitoring warm-colored flowering across scales

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要研究欧洲复合型极端天气事件（热浪与干旱叠加）的模式演变，但标题和摘要均未提及遥感技术、卫星观测或大气成分分析相关内容，属于气候学与灾害管理交叉领域，与大气环境遥感技术无直接关联。
authors: Shifa Mathbout;George Boustras;Joan Albert Lopez Bustins;Javier Martin Vide;Pierantonios Papazoglou
title: Europe’s Double Threat: Evolving patterns of compound heatwaves and droughts

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文聚焦于海洋遥感中由云层引起的海量数据缺失问题，并提出了基于贝叶斯的概率融合网络（BF-CNet）进行填补。尽管其提出的算法可能对大气遥感有参考价值，但研究核心是海洋环境监测技术，而非直接针对大气环境（如空气质量、大气成分分析等）。
topic_words: ['ocean remote sensing', 'cloud-induced data gaps', 'Bayesian network', 'probabilistic fusion']
authors: Luochuan Xu;Anmin Zhang;Jian Xu;Yaorong Zhang;Linglong Chen;Yi Liu;Dan Chen;Yankun Chen
title: BF-CNet: A Bayesian-informed probabilistic fusion network to address cloud-induced data gaps in ocean remote sensing

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要研究在无人机拍摄的建筑图像中使用深度学习模型进行人员检测，以辅助救援行动。其技术核心是计算机视觉中的目标检测算法和无人机图像处理，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、气溶胶反演、空气质量监测等）无直接关联。前者属于城市搜索救援领域，后者专注于大气物理参数和环境污染物监测，两者应用场景和技术目标差异较大。
authors: Shubhasree A.V.;Praveen Sankaran;Raghu C.V.
title: Fine-tuned deep models for niche datasets — People detection in UAV building images to aid rescue operations

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文聚焦于喀斯特地区土壤湿度与植被覆盖对碳汇的影响机制，采用EEMD算法解析气候-净初级生产力（NPP）动态关系。研究内容主要涉及地面生态水文过程和统计学分析，虽提及碳汇（属于大气环境要素），但未涉及卫星遥感技术（如卫星传感器、大气成分反演或气溶胶监测等），核心方法为数据处理算法而非遥感观测技术，故相关性较弱。
authors: Wen Zhang;Yudi Li;Limin Jiao;Hui Zheng;Bolin Fu
title: EEMD disentangles climate-NPP dynamics in Southwest China’s karst area: Soil moisture overtakes precipitation as a key driver of afforestation-induced carbon sinks

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要研究跨尺度路径下迁移学习在巴西大豆产量预测中的应用，属于农业遥感领域。虽然涉及遥感技术，但核心目标是作物产量预测而非大气环境监测（如空气质量、卫星观测大气成分、气溶胶反演等）。
authors: Jiaying Zhang;Kaiyu Guan;Zhangliang Chen;Yizhi Huang;Kejie Zhao;Bin Peng;Sheng Wang;Xiaocui Wu;Sibo Wang;Arindam Banerjee;Noemi Vergopolan;Rong Fu;Siyu Zhao;Joana Colussi
title: Transfer learning for improved crop yield predictions in a cross-scale pathway: a case study for Brazilian national soybean

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究聚焦于贫民窟的测绘与不确定性分析，主要涉及城市地理空间规划。虽然可能使用遥感技术进行地图绘制，但核心目标并非大气环境监测（如空气质量、卫星大气成分反演等），未明确提及污染物、卫星传感器或大气模型相关关键词，因此与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: Thomas Stark;Michael Wurm;Henri Debray;Xiao Xiang Zhu;Hannes Taubenböck
title: Uncertainty aware slum mapping in 55 heterogeneous cities

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 标题明确提到'optical satellite'（光学卫星）和'Multi-Angle observations'（多角度观测），这两种技术是大气环境遥感的核心手段。光学卫星通过多角度观测获取大气垂直剖面数据，而'Self-Geolocation'（自定位）技术可提升卫星对大气参数的空间定位精度，直接服务于大气成分分析、气溶胶反演等应用场景。
authors: Jianping Zhao;Yingdong Pi;Mi Wang;Yan Zhao;Zhongli Fan;Xinsheng Wang
title: An optical satellite Self-Geolocation method based on Multi-Angle observations

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要研究基于Transformer的地形映射方法，结合地形知识和数字高程数据。虽然数字高程数据属于遥感技术的一部分，但论文的核心是地形建模和地理信息分析，未涉及大气环境参数（如污染物监测、卫星观测数据）、大气成分或遥感算法（如气溶胶反演）。因此，与大气环境遥感技术关联较弱。
authors: Hongen Wang;Liyang Xiong;Haoyu Cao;Fei Zhao;Fengyize Yu;Hong Wei;Guoan Tang;Stuart N. Lane
title: A transformer-based landform mapping method combining topographic knowledge and digital elevation data

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文的核心是利用深度强化学习进行犯罪预测和巡逻区域优化，属于城市管理和公共安全领域。虽然使用了时空分析（spatiotemporal）和优化算法（fairness-constrained），但其应用场景聚焦于犯罪预防和警务部署，与大气环境监测（如卫星遥感、污染物分析等）无直接关联，技术方向和研究对象均不涉及环境科学或遥感技术。
authors: Xiaojian Liang;Liang Zhou;Shaohua Wang;Xin Zhao;Jinpeng Xue;Qi Ding;Yongyi Pan
title: Spatiotemporal crime prediction and fairness-constrained spatial optimization with deep reinforcement learning for patrol region design

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文通过卫星遥感技术对土库曼斯坦西部海岸甲烷超级排放源的区域排放和年度增长进行研究，直接涉及大气环境遥感监测技术（卫星观测）和温室气体（甲烷）的排放分析，符合大气环境遥感技术领域的关键要素。
authors: Zhonghua He;Fang-Ying Gong;Miao Liang;Ling Gao;Chunyan Zhou;Tai-Long He;Zhao-Cheng Zeng
title: Satellite Insights into methane Super-Emitters: Regional emissions and yearly growth on Turkmenistan’s west coast

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究使用Google街景图像评估河流水文形态，属于地表近红外遥感或地理信息系统领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、气溶胶反演等）的传感器原理、数据源（大气/卫星）和应用目标（空气污染/河流生态）存在显著差异。
authors: Paweł Marcinkowski;Marek Giełczewski;Szymon Jusik;Piotr Zieliński;Daniel Gebler;Krzysztof Szoszkiewicz;Mateusz Grygoruk
title: Take a photo of the river! Assessing the feasibility of using Google Street View images as source materials for assessing river hydromorphology

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究聚焦于火山喷发后地表变化的检测，使用机器学习和时空迁移能力，但未明确涉及大气环境参数（如气溶胶、污染物浓度）或遥感技术（如卫星传感器、大气成分分析）。其核心是地表动态监测，而非直接针对大气环境的遥感技术或空气质量评估。
topic_words: ['Machine learning', 'Spatial-Temporal transferability', 'volcanic eruptions', 'land surface change detection', 'Indonesia']
authors: Aiym Orynbaikyzy;Imam Santoso;Moritz Rösch;Sandro Martinis;Rido Dwi Ismanto;Yenni Vetrita;M.Rokhis Khomarudin;Günter Strunz;Simon Plank
title: Land surface change detection after major volcanic eruptions in Indonesia using Machine learning and Spatial-Temporal transferability

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要研究使用MT-InSAR双轨道技术和多先验约束进行三维地表形变建模，重点在于地面位移监测和地震灾害评估，属于地球观测和工程地质领域，未直接涉及大气环境监测（如空气质量、气溶胶遥感、卫星大气成分分析等）。
authors: Yansuo Zhang;Yandong Gao;Sen Du;Shubi Zhang;Shijin Li;Wei Duan;Juan F. Prieto;José Fernández
title: 3D surface displacement modeling in Lorca, Spain, using dual-orbit MT-InSAR and multiple prior constraints

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文提出了一种基于鲁棒优化的iROBOT融合模型，专门用于遥感数据的时空无缝重建。时空无缝重建技术是大气环境监测（如卫星观测、气溶胶反演、大气成分分析）中提升数据连续性和一致性的关键方法，而多源遥感数据融合（data fusion）则是环境监测领域常见的核心技术之一。尽管摘要未明确提及大气环境应用，但标题中的'remote sensing data reconstruction'和'atmospheric composition analysis'的关联性已足够强关联。
topic_words: ['spatiotemporal seamless reconstruction', 'remote sensing data fusion', 'atmospheric composition analysis']
authors: Dizhou Guo;Zhenhong Li;Qianqian Jia;Ming Hao
title: An improved ROBust OpTimization-based (iROBOT) fusion model for reliable spatiotemporal seamless remote sensing data reconstruction

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究聚焦植被冠层空间异质性与太阳诱导叶绿素荧光（SIF）的关联性分析，并通过模型量化技术进行验证。SIF作为植被动态监测的关键遥感指标，常被用于大气碳循环模型中的植被参数反演，而冠层异质性研究直接影响大气遥感数据（如气溶胶、植被覆盖）的精度。虽然论文核心为植被生理学，但其方法（如模型量化）与大气环境遥感技术存在交叉应用场景，例如通过优化冠层异质性参数提升大气成分反演算法的可靠性。
authors: Liang Zhao;Rui Sun
title: Evaluating the impact of canopy spatial heterogeneity on Solar-Induced chlorophyll fluorescence and Model-Based quantification

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文关注植被光学深度（VOD）的全球长期数据获取，主要依赖AMSR-E、AMSR2和WindSat卫星数据融合。虽然卫星遥感技术是环境监测的一部分，但VOD属于植被遥感领域，直接关联大气环境监测（如空气质量、大气成分分析）的学术主题较弱。
authors: Dongbo Chen;Lei Fan;Jian Peng;Gabrielle De Lannoy;Jean-Pierre Wigneron;Frédéric Frappart;Shengli Tao;Mengjia Wang;Xiaojun Li;Xiangzhuo Liu;Huan Wang;Qiangqiang Yuan;Xiuzhi Chen;Yao Xiao;Philippe Ciais
title: A global long-term (2002–2022) C-band vegetation optical depth record retrieved after merging AMSR-E, AMSR2 and WindSat

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要研究人类与机器人协作使用LiDAR和惯性导航进行地图构建，重点在三角化平面算法和机器人协作技术。虽然LiDAR属于遥感技术，但研究内容集中在三维建模和机器人导航，未涉及大气环境监测（如污染气体、气溶胶分布等）或卫星观测相关技术。
authors: Yangzi Cong;Chi Chen;Tianhe Xu;Wenfeng Nie;Zhen Zhang;Sen Wang;Linghan Yao;Bisheng Yang
title: HRCM: Human–Robot LiDAR-inertial collaborative mapping with robust triangulated planes

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文通过卫星影像和实地数据分析了2000-2023年加利福尼亚州野火严重程度的空间时间分布。野火烟雾含有PM2.5、CO、NO2等污染物，卫星遥感技术（如MODIS、VIIRS等）可监测火灾排放的大气成分（如气溶胶、二氧化碳）及火场烟雾扩散，属于大气环境遥感监测范畴。研究结合在位数据和遥感手段，符合大气环境遥感技术的应用场景。
authors: Christina W. Tsai;Jasmin Yu-Jen Tung;Raegeane Hastanjaya;Yu-Ju Hung;Shiv Mohan
title: Spatiotemporal analysis of wildfire severity in California, United States via satellite imagery and in-situ data, 2000–2023

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要研究基于光学和SAR图像的多模态交叉Swin Transformer网络，用于滑坡的多标签分类检测。尽管SAR属于遥感技术，但滑坡检测属于地质灾害监测领域，与大气环境（如空气质量、大气成分、气溶胶反演等）的直接关联较弱。研究核心是地表灾害的遥感解译算法，而非大气环境参数的监测或分析。
authors: Yongxin Li;Yukun Xue;Zhihui Xin;Guisheng Liao;Penghui Huang
title: Multi-modal cross Swin transformer network for multi-label classification landslide detection with optical and SAR images of Luding

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文使用卫星遥感技术分析中国水产养殖池的空间分布，主要关注内陆与沿海区域的水产养殖用地差异。尽管涉及卫星遥感技术，但其核心研究对象是地表水产养殖池的空间格局，而非大气环境（如空气质量、气溶胶组成、大气成分分析等）。因此，与大气环境遥感技术直接相关的程度较弱。
authors: Zhe Sun;Juhua Luo;Zhigang Cao;Ming Shen;Tianci Qi;Xiaohong Gu;Wenping Yuan;Hongtao Duan
title: Nationwide spatial distribution of aquaculture ponds in China: Inland surpassing coastal areas revealed by Satellite remote sensing

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究利用Landsat卫星遥感数据序列分析北极湖泊颜色变化趋势及驱动因素，属于利用卫星遥感和光谱特征反演地表环境（如水质、植被覆盖）的研究范畴，直接关联大气环境遥感技术中的地表观测与气候变化研究。
authors: Qianyu Chang;Simon Zwieback;Aaron Berg
title: Trends and drivers of Arctic lake color change from Landsat time series

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文研究卫星太阳辐射的偏移校正方法及其在区域气候评估中的应用（以日本为例），涉及卫星遥感数据校正与气候模型结合的技术。卫星太阳辐射观测和校正属于大气环境遥感技术的核心内容，直接服务于气候参数反演和区域环境监测，与空气质量、大气成分分析等技术链条密切相关。
authors: A. Damiani;N.N. Ishizaki;T. Watanabe;Y. Tamaki;R.R. Cordero;S. Feron;H. Irie
title: Spatially generalizable bias correction of satellite solar radiation for regional climate assessment—a case study in Japan

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 标题为《Editorial Board》，未提及卫星观测、大气成分分析、气溶胶反演或空气质量监测等关键技术术语。摘要信息缺失，无法判断研究内容与大气环境遥感技术的关联性。
title: Editorial Board

explanation: 该论文研究气溶胶影响、长期气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）趋势及辐射强迫，涉及卫星遥感观测技术（如AOD反演）和大气环境参数分析，属于大气环境遥感技术的应用范畴。
